GSP33samkupad_u:2: yat sarvaviṣayātītaṃ tasmai sarvavide namaḥ // SamUpad_I,1.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:4: brahmavidyām athedānīṃ vaktuṃ vedaḥ pracakrame // SamUpad_I,1.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:6: dhruve syātāṃ tato rāgo dveṣaś caiva tataḥ kriyāḥ // SamUpad_I,1.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:8: evaṃ nityapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃsāraś cakravad bhṛśam // SamUpad_I,1.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:9: ajñānaṃ tasya mūlaṃ syād iti taddhānam iṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:10: brahmavidyāta ārabdhā tato niḥśreyasaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:15: nanu karma tathā nityaṃ kartavyaṃ jīvane sati /
GSP33samkupad_u:16: vidyāyāḥ sahakāritvaṃ mokṣaṃ prati hi tad vrajet // SamUpad_I,1.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:18: pratyavāyasmṛteś caiva kāryaṃ karma mumukṣubhiḥ // SamUpad_I,1.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:19: nanu dhruvaphalā vidyā nānyat kiṃcid apekṣate /
GSP33samkupad_u:21: tathā dhruvaphalā vidyā karma nityam apekṣate /
GSP33samkupad_u:22: ity evaṃ kecid icchanti na karma pratikūlataḥ // SamUpad_I,1.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:23: vidyāyāḥ pratikūlaṃ hi karma syāt sābhimānataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:25: ahaṃ kartā mamedaṃ syād iti karma pravartate /
GSP33samkupad_u:26: vastvadhīnā bhaved vidyā kartradhīno bhaved vidhiḥ // SamUpad_I,1.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:28: tatsatyamatim ādāya karma kartuṃ vyavasyati // SamUpad_I,1.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:29: viruddhatvād ataḥ śakyaṃ karma kartuṃ na vidyayā /
GSP33samkupad_u:30: sahaivaṃ viduṣā tasmāt karma heyaṃ mumukṣuṇā // SamUpad_I,1.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:32: prāṇināṃ tad avidyotthaṃ tāvat karmavidhir bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:35: nivṛttā sā kathaṃ bhūyaḥ prasūyeta pramāṇataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:36: asaty evāviśeṣe hi pratyagātmani kevale // SamUpad_I,1.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:37: na ced bhūyaḥ prasūyeta kartā bhokteti dhīḥ katham /
GSP33samkupad_u:38: sad asmīti ca vijñāne tasmād vidyāsahāyikā // SamUpad_I,1.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:39: atyarecayad ity ukto nyāsaḥ śrutyāta eva hi /
GSP33samkupad_u:40: karmabhyo mānasāntebhya etāvad iti vājinām // SamUpad_I,1.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:41: amṛtatvaṃ śrutaṃ tasmāt tyājyaṃ karma mumukṣubhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:42: agniṣṭomavad ity uktaṃ tatredam abhidhīyate // SamUpad_I,1.21 //
GSP33samkupad_u:44: vidyā tadviparītāto dṛṣṭānto viṣamo bhavet // SamUpad_I,1.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:46: agniṣṭomas tv apekṣeta vidyānyat kim apekṣate // SamUpad_I,1.23 //
GSP33samkupad_u:52: mandīkaraṇabhāvāc ca garbhādeḥ śātanāt tathā // SamUpad_I,1.26 //
GSP33samkupad_u:55: idaṃ nāham idaṃ nāham ity addhā pratipadyate // SamUpad_I,2,1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:57: niṣiddhātmodbhavatvāt sā na punar mānatāṃ vrajet // SamUpad_I,2.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:59: dṛśir ekaḥ svayaṃsiddhaḥ phalatvāt sa na bādhyate // SamUpad_I,2.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:61: vanād gāndhārako yadvat svam ātmānaṃ prapadyate // SamUpad_I,2.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:63: īśvaraś ced anātmā syān nāsāv asmīti dhārayet /
GSP33samkupad_u:64: ātmā ced īśvaro 'smīti vidyā sānyanivartikā // SamUpad_I,3.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:66: ajñeyatve 'sya kiṃ taiḥ syād ātmatve tv anyadhīhnutiḥ // SamUpad_I,3.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:68: paratra cen niṣedhārthaṃ śūnyatāvarṇanaṃ hi tat // SamUpad_I,3.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:70: aprāṇo hy amanāḥ śubhra iti cānarthakaṃ vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,3.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:74: dṛṣṭavac cet prarohaḥ syān nānyakarmā sa iṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:75: tannirodhe kathaṃ tat syāt pṛcchāmo vas tad ucyatām // SamUpad_I,4.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:77: abhibhūya phalaṃ kuryāt karmānte jñānam udbhavet // SamUpad_I,4.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:78: ārabdhasya phale hy ete bhogo jñānaṃ ca karmaṇaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:79: avirodhas tayor yukto vaidharmyaṃ cetarasya tu // SamUpad_I,4.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:81: ātmany eya bhaved yasya sa necchann api mucyate // SamUpad_I,4.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:82: [tataḥ sarvam idaṃ siddhaṃ prayogo 'smābhir īritaḥ // SamUpad_I,4.5 //]
GSP33samkupad_u:87: naugatasya yathā vṛkṣās tadvat saṃsāravibhramaḥ // SamUpad_I,5.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:89: ātmanaḥ saṃsṛtis tadvad dhyāyatīveti hi śrutiḥ // SamUpad_I,5.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:91: buddheḥ śabdādinirbhāsas tena momuhyate jagat // SamUpad_I,5.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:92: caitanyābhāsatāhamas tādarthyaṃ ca tad asya yat /
GSP33samkupad_u:93: idamaṃśaprahāṇe na paraḥ so 'nubhavo bhavet // SamUpad_I,5.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:95: chittvā tyaktena hastena svayaṃ nātmā viśeṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:96: tathā śiṣṭena sarveṇa yena yena viśeṣyate // SamUpad_I,6.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:97: tasmāt tyaktena hastena tulyaṃ sarvaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33samkupad_u:98: anātmatvena tasmāj jño muktaḥ sarvaviśeṣaṇaiḥ // SamUpad_I,6.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:100: avidyāstam ataḥ sarvaṃ jñāta ātmany asad bhavet // SamUpad_I,6.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:101: jñātaivātmā sadā grāhyo jñeyam utsṛjya kevalaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:102: aham ity api yad grāhyaṃ vyapetāṅgasamaṃ hi tat // SamUpad_I,6.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:103: yāvān syād idamaṃśo yaḥ sa svato 'nyo viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33samkupad_u:104: viśeṣaprakṣayo yatra siddho jñaś citragur yathā // SamUpad_I,6.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:105: idam aṃśo 'ham ity atra tyājyo nātmeti paṇḍitaiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:106: ahaṃ brahmeti śiṣṭo 'ṃśo bhūtapūrvagater bhavet // SamUpad_I,6.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:108: buddhyārūḍhaṃ sadā sarvaṃ dṛśyate yatra tatra vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:109: mayā tasmāt paraṃ brahma sarvajñaś cāsmi sarvagaḥ // SamUpad_I,7.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:111: naivāpoḍhuṃ na vādātuṃ śakyas tasmāt paro hy aham // SamUpad_I,7.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:115: mayi saṃdṛśyate sarvam ātapeneva tan mayā // SamUpad_I,7.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:116: buddhau dṛśyaṃ bhaved buddhau satyāṃ nāsti viparyaye /
GSP33samkupad_u:117: draṣṭā yasmāt sadā draṣṭā tasmād dvaitaṃ na vidyate // SamUpad_I,7.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:118: avivekāt parābhāvaṃ yathā buddhir avet tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:119: vivekāt tu parād anyaḥ svayaṃ cāpi na vidyate // SamUpad_I,7.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:121: citisvarūpaṃ svata eva me mate rasādiyogas tava mohakāritaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:122: ato na kiṃcit tava ceṣṭitena me phalaṃ bhavet sarvaviśeṣahānataḥ // SamUpad_I,8.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:123: vimucya māyāmayakāryatām iha praśāntim āyāhy asadīhitāt sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:124: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma sadā vimuktavat tathājam ekaṃ dvayavarjitaṃ yataḥ // SamUpad_I,8.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:125: sadā ca bhūteṣu samo 'smi kevalo yathā ca khaṃ sarvagam akṣaraṃ śivam /
GSP33samkupad_u:126: nirantaraṃ niṣkalam akriyaṃ paraṃ tato na me 'stīha phalaṃ tavehitaiḥ // SamUpad_I,8.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:127: ahaṃ mamaiko na tadanyad iṣyate tathā na kasyāpy aham asmy asaṅgataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:128: asaṅgarūpo 'ham ato na me tvayā kṛtena kāryaṃ tava cādvayatvataḥ // SamUpad_I,8.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:129: phale ca hetau ca jano viṣaktavān iti pracintyāham ato vimokṣaṇe /
GSP33samkupad_u:130: janasya saṃvādam imaṃ prakḷptavān svarūpatattvārthavibodhakāraṇam // SamUpad_I,8.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:131: saṃvādam etaṃ yadi cintayen naro vimucyate 'jñānamahābhayāgamāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:132: vimuktakāmaś ca tathā janaḥ sadā caraty aśokaḥ sama ātmavit sukhī // SamUpad_I,8.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:136: śārīrā pṛthivī tāvad yāvad bāhyā pramāṇataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:137: abādīni ca tattvāni tāvaj jñeyāni kṛtsnaśaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:138: vāyvādīnāṃ yathotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ khaṃ sarvagaṃ tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:139: aham ekaḥ sadā sarvaś cinmātraḥ sarvago 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:140: brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāntā ye prāṇino mama pūḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:141: kāmakrodhādayo doṣā jāyeran me kuto 'nyataḥ // SamUpad_I,9.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:143: nīlaṃ vyoma yathā bālo duṣṭaṃ māṃ vīkṣate janaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:145: pūr mama prāṇinaḥ sarve sarvajñasya vipāpmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,9.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:147: nityaṃ nirviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tasmād dvaitaṃ na vidyate // SamUpad_I,9.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:148: jñātur jñātir hi nityoktā suṣupte tv anyaśūnyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:149: jāgrajjñātis tv avidyātas tad grāhyaṃ cāsad iṣyatām // SamUpad_I,9.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:151: evaṃ vijñānakarmatvaṃ bhūmno nāstīti gamyate // SamUpad_I,9.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:153: dṛśisvarūpaṃ gaganopamaṃ paraṃ sakṛdvibhātaṃ tv ajam ekam akṣaram /
GSP33samkupad_u:154: alepakaṃ sarvagataṃ yad advayaṃ tad eva cāhaṃ satataṃ vimukta om // SamUpad_I,10.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:155: dṛśis tu śuddho 'ham avikriyātmako na me 'sti kaścid viṣayaḥ svabhāvataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:156: puras tiraś cordhvam adhaś ca sarvataḥ supūrṇabhūmā tv aja ātmani sthitaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:157: ajo 'maraś caiva tathājaro 'mṛtaḥ svayaṃprabhaḥ sarvagato 'ham advayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:158: na kāraṇaṃ kāryam atīva nirmalaḥ sadaiva tṛptaś ca tato vimukta om // SamUpad_I,10.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:159: suṣuptajāgratsvapataś ca darśanaṃ na me 'sti kiṃcit svam iveha mohanam /
GSP33samkupad_u:160: svataś ca teṣāṃ parato 'py asattvatas turīya evāsmi sadā dṛg advayaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:161: śarīrabuddhīndriyaduḥkhasaṃtatir na me na cāhaṃ mama nirvikārataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:162: asattvahetoś ca tathaiva saṃtater asattvam asyāḥ svapato hi dṛśyavat // SamUpad_I,10.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:163: idaṃ tu satyaṃ mama nāsti vikriyā vikārahetur na hi me 'dvayatvataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:164: na puṇyapāpe na ca mokṣabandhane na cāsti varṇāśramatāśarīrataḥ // SamUpad_I,10.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:165: anādito nirguṇato na karma me phalaṃ ca tasmāt paramo 'ham advayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:166: yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na lipyate tathā hy ahaṃ dehagato 'pi sūkṣmataḥ // SamUpad_I,10.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:167: sadā ca bhūteṣu samo 'ham īśvaraḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ paramo hy athottamaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:168: parātmatattvaś ca tathādvayo 'pi san viparyayeṇābhivṛtas tv avidyayā // SamUpad_I,10.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:169: avidyayā bhāvanayā ca karmabhir vivikta ātmāvyavadhiḥ sunirmalaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:170: dṛgādiśaktipracito 'ham advayaḥ sthitaḥ svarūpe gaganaṃ yathācalam // SamUpad_I,10.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:171: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma viniścayātmadṛṅ na jāyate bhūya iti śruter vacaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:172: na caiva bīje tv asati prajāyate phalaṃ na janmāsti tato hy amohatā // SamUpad_I,10.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:173: mamedam itthaṃ ca tavāda īdṛśaṃ tathāham evaṃ na paro 'pi cānyathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:174: vimūḍhataivāsya janasya kalpanā sadā same brahmaṇi vādvaye śive // SamUpad_I,10.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:175: yad advayaṃ jñānam atīva nirmalaṃ mahātmanāṃ tatra na śokamohatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:176: tayor abhāve na hi karma janma vā bhaved ayaṃ vedavidāṃ viniścayaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:177: suṣuptavaj jāgrati yo na paśyati dvayaṃ tu paśyann api cādvayatvataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:178: tathā ca kurvann api niṣkriyaś ca yaḥ sa ātmavin nānya itīha niścayaḥ // SamUpad_I,10.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:179: itīdam uktaṃ paramārthadarśanaṃ mayā hi vedāntaviniścitaṃ param /
GSP33samkupad_u:180: vimucyate 'smin yadi niścito bhaven na lipyate vyomavad eva karmabhiḥ // SamUpad_I,10.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:183: ajñānād ity ato 'nyatvaṃ sad asīti nivartyate // SamUpad_I,11.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:184: etāvad dhy amṛtatvaṃ na kiṃcid anyat sahāyakam /
GSP33samkupad_u:185: jñānasyeti bruvac chāstraṃ saliṅgaṃ karma bādhate // SamUpad_I,11.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:187: tasya me nirvikārasya viśeṣaḥ syāt kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,11.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:190: svapnaḥ satyo yathābodhād dehātmatvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:191: pratyakṣādeḥ pramāṇatvaṃ jāgrat syād ātmavedanāt // SamUpad_I,11.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:193: sākṣī cetāguṇaḥ śuddho brahmaivāsmīti kevalaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:195: aham ātmā paraṃ brahma cinmātro 'haṃ sadādvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:196: ahaṃ brahmāsmi kartā ca bhoktā cāsmīti ye viduḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:197: te naṣṭā jñanakarmabhyāṃ nāstikāḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:199: śāstrād brahmatvam apy asya mokṣo jñānāt tatheṣyatām // SamUpad_I,11.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:201: anubhūyanta eveha tato 'nyaḥ kevalo dṛśiḥ // SamUpad_I,11.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:203: yathāsir dṛśyate svapne tadvad boddhā svayaṃprabhaḥ // SamUpad_I,11.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:207: svapne tadvad dvayaṃ vidyād rūpaṃ vāsanayā saha // SamUpad_I,11.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:209: netinetyātmarūpatvān na me kāryā kriyā kvacit // SamUpad_I,11.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:211: mokṣasya jñānahetutvān na tadanyad apekṣate // SamUpad_I,11.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:212: amṛtaṃ cābhayaṃ nārtaṃ netītyātmā priyo mama /
GSP33samkupad_u:213: viparītam ato 'nyad yat tyajet tat sakriyaṃ tataḥ // SamUpad_I,11.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:216: draṣṭrābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ draṣṭāham iti manyate // SamUpad_I,12.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:217: yad eva dṛṣyate loke tenābhinnatvam ātmanaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:218: prapadyate tato mūḍhas tenātmānaṃ na vindati // SamUpad_I,12.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:220: dṛśyeṣu tadvad evāyaṃ mūḍho loko na cānyathā // SamUpad_I,12.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:221: tvaṃ kuru tvaṃ tad eveti pratyayāv ekakālikau /
GSP33samkupad_u:222: ekanīḍau kathaṃ syātāṃ viruddhau nyāyato vada // SamUpad_I,12.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:224: svāpavat tatprahāṇāya tat tvam ity ucyate dṛśeḥ // SamUpad_I,12.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:226: paśyaṃs taṃ pratyayaṃ yogī dṛṣṭa atmeti manyate // SamUpad_I,12.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:227: taṃ ca mūḍhaṃ ca yady anyaṃ pratyayaṃ vetti no dṛśeḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:228: sa eva yogināṃ śreṣṭho netaraḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,12.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:229: vijñāter yas tu vijñātā sa tvam ity ucyate yataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:230: sa syād anubhavas tasya tato 'nyo 'nubhavo mṛṣā // SamUpad_I,12.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:232: kathaṃ syātāṃ tato nānya iṣyate 'nubhavas tataḥ // SamUpad_I,12.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:233: yatsthas tāpo raver dehe dṛśeḥ sa viṣayo yathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:234: sattvasthas tadvad eveha dṛśeḥ sa viṣayas tathā // SamUpad_I,12.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:236: nityamuktas tathā śuddhaḥ so 'haṃ brahmāsmi kevalaḥ // SamUpad_I,12.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:237: vijñātur naiva vijñātā paro 'nyaḥ saṃbhavaty ataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:238: vijñātāhaṃ paro muktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā // SamUpad_I,12.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:240: brahmavittvaṃ tathā muktvā sa ātmajño na cetaraḥ // SamUpad_I,12.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:241: jñātaivāham avijñeyaḥ śuddho muktaḥ sadety api /
GSP33samkupad_u:242: vivekī pratyayo buddher dṛśyatvān nāśavattvataḥ // SamUpad_I,12.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:243: aluptā tv ātmano dṛṣṭir notpādyā kārakair yataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:244: dṛśyayā cānyayā dṛṣṭyā janyatāsyāḥ prakalpitā // SamUpad_I,12.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:246: naiva kiṃcit karomīti satyā buddhiḥ pramāṇajā // SamUpad_I,12.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:248: kartā bhokteti vijñānaṃ mṛṣaiveti suniścitam // SamUpad_I,12.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:250: niyojyo 'ham iti hy eṣā satyā buddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,12.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:251: yathā sarvāntaraṃ vyoma vyomno 'py abhyantaro hy aham /
GSP33samkupad_u:254: acakṣuṣṭvān na dṛṣṭir me tathāśrotrasya kā śrutiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:255: avāktvān na tu vaktiḥ syād amanastvān matiḥ kutaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:256: aprāṇasya na karmāsti buddhyabhāve na veditā /
GSP33samkupad_u:257: vidyāvidye tato na staś cinmātrajyotiṣo mama // SamUpad_I,13.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:260: jighatsā vā pipāsā vā śokamohau jarāmṛtī /
GSP33samkupad_u:261: na vidyante 'śarīratvād vyomavad vyāpino mama // SamUpad_I,13.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:262: asparśatvān na me spṛṣṭir nājihvatvād rasajñatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:263: nityavijñānarūpasya jñānājñāne na me sadā // SamUpad_I,13.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:264: yā tu syān mānasī vṛttiś cākṣuṣkā rūparañjanā /
GSP33samkupad_u:265: nityam evātmano dṛṣṭyā nityayā dṛśyate hi sā // SamUpad_I,13.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:267: smṛtī rāgādirūpa ca kevalāntar manasy api // SamUpad_I,13.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:269: draṣṭur dṛṣṭis tato nityā śuddhānantā ca kevalā // SamUpad_I,13.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:271: sukhī duḥkhī tathā cāhaṃ dṛśyayopādhibhūtayā // SamUpad_I,13.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:272: mūḍhayā mūḍha ity evaṃ śuddhayā śuddha ity api /
GSP33samkupad_u:273: manyate sarvaloko 'yaṃ yena saṃsāram ṛcchati // SamUpad_I,13.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:275: nityamuktam ihātmānaṃ mumukṣuś cet sadā smaret // SamUpad_I,13.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:277: aprāṇo hy amanāḥ śubhra iti cātharvaṇe vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:278: śabdādīnām abhāvaś ca śrūyate mama kāṭhake /
GSP33samkupad_u:279: aprāṇo hy amanā yasmād avikārī sadā hy aham // SamUpad_I,13.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:280: vikṣepo nāsti tasmān me na samādhis tato mama /
GSP33samkupad_u:281: vikṣepo vā samādhir vā manasaḥ syād vikāriṇaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:282: amanaskasya śuddhasya kathaṃ tat syād dvayaṃ mama /
GSP33samkupad_u:284: ity etad yāvad ajñānaṃ tāvat kāryaṃ mamābhavat /
GSP33samkupad_u:285: nityamuktasya śuddhasya buddhasya ca sadā mama // SamUpad_I,13.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:286: samādhir vāsamādhir vā kāryaṃ vānyat kuto bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:287: maṃ hi dhyātvā ca buddhvā ca manyante kṛtakṛtyatām // SamUpad_I,13.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:288: ahaṃ brahmāsmi sarvo 'smi śuddho buddho 'sitaḥ sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:289: ajaḥ sarvaga evāham ajaraś cāmṛto 'kṣayaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:290: madanyaḥ sarvabhūteṣu boddhā kaścin na vidyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:291: karmādhyakṣaś ca sākṣī ca cetā nityo 'guṇo 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:292: na sac cāhaṃ na cāsac ca nobhayaṃ kevalaḥ śivaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:293: na me saṃdhyā na rātrir vā nāhar vā sarvadā dṛśeḥ // SamUpad_I,13.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:294: sarvamūrtiviyuktaṃ yad yathā khaṃ sūkṣmam advayam /
GSP33samkupad_u:295: tenāpy asmi vinābhūtaṃ brahmaivāhaṃ tathādvayam // SamUpad_I,13.21 //
GSP33samkupad_u:296: mamātmāsya ta ātmeti bhedo vyomno yathā bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:297: ekasya suṣibhedena tathā mama vikalpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:298: bhedo 'bhedas tathā caiko nānā ceti vikalpitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:299: jñeyaṃ jñātā gatir gantā mayy ekasmin kuto bhavet // SamUpad_I,13.23 //
GSP33samkupad_u:300: na me heyaṃ na cādeyam avikārī yato hy aham /
GSP33samkupad_u:301: sadā muktas tathā śuddhaḥ sadā buddho 'guṇo 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,13.24 //
GSP33samkupad_u:302: ity evaṃ sarvadātmānaṃ vidyāt sarvaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:303: viditvā māṃ svadehastham ṛṣir mukto dhruvo bhavet // SamUpad_I,13.25 //
GSP33samkupad_u:304: kṛtakṛtyaś ca siddhaś ca yogī brāhmaṇa eva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:305: yadaivaṃ veda tattvārtham anyathā hy ātmahā bhavet // SamUpad_I,13.26 //
GSP33samkupad_u:306: vedārtho niścito hy eṣa samāsena mayoditaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:310: purā nūnaṃ tadākarā dhīr dṛṣṭety anumīyate // SamUpad_I,14.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:311: bhikṣām aṭan yathā svapne dṛṣṭo deho na sa svayam /
GSP33samkupad_u:312: jāgraddṛśyāt tathā dehād draṣṭṛtvād anya eva saḥ // SamUpad_I,14.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:313: mūṣāsiktaṃ yathā tāmraṃ tannibhaṃ jāyate tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:314: rūpādīn vyāpnuvac cittaṃ tannibhaṃ dṛśyate dhruvam // SamUpad_I,14.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:317: dhir evārthasvarūpā hi puṃsā dṛṣṭā purāpi ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:318: na cet svapne kathaṃ paśyet smarato vākṛtiḥ kutaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:320: draṣṭṛtvaṃ ca dṛśes tadvad vyāptiḥ syād dhiya udbhave // SamUpad_I,14.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:322: mayā yasmāt prakāśyante sarvasyātmā tato hy aham // SamUpad_I,14.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:323: karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca kriyā svapne phalaṃ ca dhīḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:324: jāgraty evaṃ yato dṛṣṭā draṣṭā tasmāt tato 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,14.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:326: hānopādānakartātmā na tyājyo na ca gṛhyate // SamUpad_I,14.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:328: bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ cānyat kathaṃ heyaṃ prakalpyate // SamUpad_I,14.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:329: ya ātmā neti netīti parāpohena śeṣitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:330: sa ced brahmavidātmeṣṭo yatetātaḥ paraṃ katham // SamUpad_I,14.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:332: kāryavān syāṃ kathaṃ cāhaṃ vimṛśed evam añjasā // SamUpad_I,14.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:333: pāragas tu yathā nadyās tatsthaḥ paraṃ yiyāsati /
GSP33samkupad_u:334: ātmajñaś cet tathā kāryaṃ kartum anyad ihecchati // SamUpad_I,14.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:336: na mokṣārhaḥ sa vijñeyo vānto 'sau brahmaṇā dhruvam // SamUpad_I,14.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:337: sādityaṃ hi jagat prāṇas tasmān nāhar niśaiva vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:338: prāṇajñasyāpi na syātāṃ kuto brahmavido 'dvaye // SamUpad_I,14.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:339: na smaraty ātmano hy ātmā vismared vāpy aluptacit /
GSP33samkupad_u:340: mano 'pi smaratīty etaj jñānam ajñānahetujam // SamUpad_I,14.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:341: jñātur jñeyaḥ paro hy ātmā so 'vidyākalpitaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:342: apoḍhe vidyayā tasmin rajjvāṃ sarpa ivādvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:344: mamāhaṃ ceti yo bhāvas tasmin kasya kuto bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:345: ātmā hy ātmīya ity eṣa bhāvo 'vidyāprakalpitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:346: ātmaikatve hy asau nāsti bījabhāve kutaḥ phalam // SamUpad_I,14.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:347: draṣṭṛ srotṛ tathā mantṛ vijñātṛ eva tad akṣaram /
GSP33samkupad_u:348: draṣṭrādyanyan na tad yasmāt tasmād draṣṭāham akṣaram // SamUpad_I,14.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:350: sarvam akṣaram evātaḥ sarvasyātmākṣaraṃ tv aham // SamUpad_I,14.21 //
GSP33samkupad_u:352: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // SamUpad_I,14.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:354: ātmanīti yadi jñātam ādhvaṃ svasthāḥ kim īhitaiḥ // SamUpad_I,14.23 //
GSP33samkupad_u:355: yo 'haṃkartāram ātmānaṃ tathā vettāram eva yaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:356: vetty anātmajña evāsau yo 'nyathājñaḥ sa ātmavit // SamUpad_I,14.24 //
GSP33samkupad_u:359: dṛṣṭiḥ śrutir matir jñātiḥ svapne dṛṣṭā janaiḥ sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:362: tasyātmajñasya śocyaḥ syuḥ sabrahmendrā apīśvarāḥ // SamUpad_I,14.27 //
GSP33samkupad_u:363: īśvaratvena kiṃ tasya brahmendratvena vā punaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:364: tṛṣṇā cet sarvataś chinnā sarvadainyodbhavāśubhā // SamUpad_I,14.28 //
GSP33samkupad_u:365: aham ity ātmadhīr yā ca mamety ātmīyadhīr api /
GSP33samkupad_u:366: arthaśūnye yadā yasya sa ātmajño bhavet tadā // SamUpad_I,14.29 //
GSP33samkupad_u:367: buddhyādau saty upādhau ca tathāsaty aviśeṣatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:368: yasya ced ātmano jñātā tasya kāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.30 //
GSP33samkupad_u:370: utpannātmadhiyo brūta kim anyat kāryam iṣyate // SamUpad_I,14.31 //
GSP33samkupad_u:372: paśyann icchaty asau nūnaṃ śītīkartuṃ vibhāvasum // SamUpad_I,14.32 //
GSP33samkupad_u:374: dhyāyatīveti cokto hi śuddho muktaḥ svato hi saḥ // SamUpad_I,14.33 //
GSP33samkupad_u:376: vyomavad vyāpino hy asya kathaṃ kāryaṃ bhaven mama // SamUpad_I,14.34 //
GSP33samkupad_u:378: brahmaṇo me viśuddhasya śodhyaṃ cānyad vipāpmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.35 //
GSP33samkupad_u:380: nordhvaṃ nādhas tiro vāpi niṣkalasyāguṇatvataḥ // SamUpad_I,14.36 //
GSP33samkupad_u:381: cinmātrajyotiṣo nityaṃ tamas tasmin na vidyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:382: kathaṃ kāryaṃ mamaivādya nityamuktasya śiṣyate // SamUpad_I,14.37 //
GSP33samkupad_u:383: amanaskasya kā cintā kriyā vānindriyasya kā /
GSP33samkupad_u:384: aprāṇo hy amanāḥ śubhra iti satyaṃ śruter vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.38 //
GSP33samkupad_u:386: ātmano naiva kālāder apekṣā dhyāyataḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,14.39 //
GSP33samkupad_u:387: yasmin devāś ca vedāś ca pavitraṃ kṛtsnam ekatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:388: vrajet tan mānasaṃ tīrthaṃ yasmin snātvāmṛto bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.40 //
GSP33samkupad_u:389: na cāsti śabdādir ananyavedanaḥ paraspareṇāpi na caiva dṛśyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:390: pareṇa dṛśyās tu yathā rasādayas tathaiva dṛśyatvata eva daihikāḥ // SamUpad_I,14.41 //
GSP33samkupad_u:391: ahaṃ mamety eṣaṇayatnavikriyāḥ sukhādayas tadvad iha pradṛśyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:392: dṛśyatvayogāc ca paraspareṇa te na dṛśyatāṃ yānti tataḥ paro bhavet // SamUpad_I,14.42 //
GSP33samkupad_u:393: ahaṃkriyādyā hi samastavikriyā sakartṛkā karmaphalena saṃhitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:394: citisvarūpeṇa samantato 'rkavat prakāśyamānāsitatātmano hy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,14.43 //
GSP33samkupad_u:395: dṛśisvarūpeṇa hi sarvadehināṃ viyad yathā vyāpya manāṃsy avasthitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:396: ato na tasmād aparo 'sti veditā paro 'pi tasmād ata eka īśvaraḥ // SamUpad_I,14.44 //
GSP33samkupad_u:397: śarīrabuddhyor yadi cānyadṛśyatā nirātmavādāḥ sunirākṛṭā mayā /
GSP33samkupad_u:398: paraś ca siddho hy aviśuddhikarmataḥ sunirmalaḥ sarvagato 'sito 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.45 //
GSP33samkupad_u:399: ghaṭādirūpaṃ yadi te na gṛhyate manaḥ pravṛttaṃ bahudhā svavṛttibhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:400: aśuddhyacidrūpavikāradoṣatā mater yathā vārayituṃ na pāryate // SamUpad_I,14.46 //
GSP33samkupad_u:401: yathā viśuddhaṃ gaganaṃ nirantaraṃ na sajjate nāpi ca lipyate tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:402: samastabhūteṣu sadaiva teṣv ayaṃ samaḥ sadātmā hy ajaro 'maro 'bhayaḥ // SamUpad_I,14.47 //
GSP33samkupad_u:403: amūrtamūrtāni ca karmavāsanā dṛśisvarūpasya bahiḥ prakalpitāḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:404: avidyayā hy ātmani mūḍhadṛṣṭibhir apohya netīty avaśeṣito dṛśiḥ // SamUpad_I,14.48 //
GSP33samkupad_u:405: prabodharūpaṃ manaso 'rthayogajaṃ smṛtau ca suptasya ca dṛśyate 'rthavat /
GSP33samkupad_u:406: tathaiva dehapratimānataḥ pṛthag dṛśeḥ śarīraṃ ca manaś ca dṛśyataḥ // SamUpad_I,14.49 //
GSP33samkupad_u:407: svabhāvaśuddhe gagane ghanādike male 'payāte sati cāviśeṣatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:408: yathā ca tadvac chrutivāritadvaye sadāviśeṣo gaganopame dṛśau // SamUpad_I,14.50 //
GSP33samkupad_u:410: nānyad anyad bhaved yasmān nānyat kiṃcid vicintayet /
GSP33samkupad_u:411: anyasyānyatvabhāve hi nāśas tasya dhruvo bhavet // SamUpad_I,15.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:412: smarato dṛśyate dṛṣṭaṃ paṭe citram ivārpitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:413: yatra yena ca tau jñeyau sattvakṣetrajñasaṃjñakau // SamUpad_I,15.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:415: smaryamāṇaṃ hi karmasthaṃ pūrvaṃ karmaiva tat tataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:416: draṣṭuś cānyad bhaved dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatvād ghaṭavat sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:417: dṛśyād draṣṭāsajātīyo na dhīvat sākṣitānyathā // SamUpad_I,15.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:419: jātyādiḥ śavavat tena tadvan nānātmatānyathā // SamUpad_I,15.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:420: na priyāpriya ity ukter nādehatvaṃ kriyāphalam /
GSP33samkupad_u:421: dehayogaḥ kriyāhetus tasmād vidvān kriyās tyajet // SamUpad_I,15.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:422: karmasv ātmā svatantraś cen nivṛttau ca tatheṣyatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:423: adehatve phale 'kārye jñāte kuryāt kathaṃ kriyāḥ // SamUpad_I,15.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:425: karmahetuviruddhaṃ yat svarūpaṃ śāstrataḥ smaret // SamUpad_I,15.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:426: ātmaikaḥ sarvabhūteṣu tāni tasmiṃś ca khe yathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:427: paryagād vyomavat sarvaṃ śukraṃ dīptimad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,15.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:429: śuddhāpāpatayā lepaṃ liṅgaṃ cākāyam ity uta // SamUpad_I,15.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:431: tadvad vetti ya ātmānaṃ samaṃ sa brahmavittamaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:432: yathā hy anyaśarīreṣu mamāhantā na ceṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:433: asmiṃś cāpi tathā dehe dhīsākṣitvāviśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:435: gṛhyate dhīśrayaṃ tasmāj jñātā śuddho 'bhayaḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,15.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:437: ātmatve cānapekṣatvāt sāpekṣaṃ hi na tat svayam // SamUpad_I,15.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:440: dṛśyatvād aham ity eṣa nātmadharmo ghaṭādivat /
GSP33samkupad_u:441: tathānye pratyayā jñeyā doṣāś cātmāmalo hy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:443: vikriyeta yadi draṣṭā buddhyādīvālpavid bhavet // SamUpad_I,15.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:444: na dṛṣṭir lupyate draṣṭuś cakṣurāder yathaiva tu /
GSP33samkupad_u:445: nahi draṣṭur iti hy uktaṃ tasmād draṣṭā sadaiva bhuk // SamUpad_I,15.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:446: saṃghāto vāsmi bhūtānāṃ karaṇānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:447: vyastaṃ vānyatamo vāsmi ko āsmīti vicārayet // SamUpad_I,15.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:448: vyastaṃ nāhaṃ samastaṃ vā bhūtam indriyam eva vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:449: jñeyatvāt karaṇatvāc ca jñātānyo 'smād ghaṭādivat // SamUpad_I,15.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:451: dīpitā prajvalaty eṣa dvāraiḥ śrotrādibhiḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,15.21 //
GSP33samkupad_u:453: viṣayair haviṣā dīptā ātmāgniḥ sthūlabhuk tadā // SamUpad_I,15.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:455: arāgadveṣa ātmāgnau jāgraddoṣair na lipyate // SamUpad_I,15.23 //
GSP33samkupad_u:458: viṣayā vāsanā vāpi codyante naiva karmabhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:459: yadā buddhau tadā jñeyaḥ prājña ātmā hy ananyadṛk // SamUpad_I,15.25 //
GSP33samkupad_u:463: kartā tāsāṃ yadarthās tā mūḍhair evābhidhīyate // SamUpad_I,15.27 //
GSP33samkupad_u:464: sarvajño 'py ata eva syāt svena bhāsāvabhāsayan /
GSP33samkupad_u:467: niṣkalo nirguṇaḥ śuddhas taṃ mano vāk ca nāpnutaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.29 //
GSP33samkupad_u:469: baddho muktas tathā caiko naikaḥ śuddho 'nyatheti vā // SamUpad_I,15.30 //
GSP33samkupad_u:470: aprāpyaiva nivartante vāco dhībhiḥ sahaiva tu /
GSP33samkupad_u:471: nirguṇatvāt kriyābhāvād viśeṣāṇāṃ hy abhāvataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.31 //
GSP33samkupad_u:472: vyāpakaṃ sarvato vyoma mūrtaiḥ sarvair viyojitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:473: yathā tadvad ihātmānaṃ vidyāc chuddhaṃ paraṃ padam // SamUpad_I,15.32 //
GSP33samkupad_u:474: dṛṣṭaṃ hitvā smṛtiṃ tasmin sarvagraś ca tamas tyajet /
GSP33samkupad_u:475: sarvadṛg jyotiṣā yukto dinakṛc chārvaraṃ yathā // SamUpad_I,15.33 //
GSP33samkupad_u:477: sa evātmā samo draṣṭā sarvabhūteṣu sarvagaḥ // SamUpad_I,15.34 //
GSP33samkupad_u:480: vivicyāsmāt svam ātmānaṃ vidyāc chuddhaṃ paraṃ padam /
GSP33samkupad_u:482: samastaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ vimalaṃ vyomavat sthitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:483: niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ dvandvair vivarjitam // SamUpad_I,15.37 //
GSP33samkupad_u:484: sarvapratyayasākṣī jñaḥ kathaṃ jñeyo mayety uta /
GSP33samkupad_u:485: vimṛśyaivaṃ vijānīyāj jñātaṃ brahma na veti vā // SamUpad_I,15.38 //
GSP33samkupad_u:487: naiva jñeyaṃ mayānyair vā paraṃ brahma kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,15.39 //
GSP33samkupad_u:489: anyajñānānapekṣatvāj jñātaṃ caiva sadā mayā // SamUpad_I,15.40 //
GSP33samkupad_u:492: na tasyaivānyato 'pekṣā svarūpaṃ yasya yad bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:493: prakāśāntaradṛśyo na prakāśo hy asti kaścana // SamUpad_I,15.42 //
GSP33samkupad_u:495: prakāśas tv arkakāryaḥ syād iti mithya vaco hy ataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.43 //
GSP33samkupad_u:496: yato 'bhūtvā bhaved yac ca tasya tat kāryam iṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:497: svarūpatvād abhūtvā na prakāśo jāyate raveḥ // SamUpad_I,15.44 //
GSP33samkupad_u:500: bilāt sarpasya niryāṇe sūryo yadvat prakāśakaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:501: prayatnena vinā tadvaj jñātātmā bodharūpataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.46 //
GSP33samkupad_u:503: saty eva yad upādhau tu jñāte sarpa ivotthite // SamUpad_I,15.47 //
GSP33samkupad_u:504: jñātāyatno 'pi tadvaj jñaḥ kartā bhrāmakavad bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:505: svarūpeṇa svayaṃ nātmā jñeyo 'jñeyo 'thavā tataḥ // SamUpad_I,15.48 //
GSP33samkupad_u:507: bandhamokṣādayo bhāvās tadvad ātmani kalpitāḥ // SamUpad_I,15.49 //
GSP33samkupad_u:511: yathoktena vidhānena sa satyaṃ naiva jāyate // SamUpad_I,15.51 //
GSP33samkupad_u:513: ita uddhartum ātmānaṃ jñānād anyena kenacit // SamUpad_I,15.52 //
GSP33samkupad_u:515: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭa” iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,15.53 //
GSP33samkupad_u:516: mamāham ity etad apohya sarvato vimuktadehaṃ padam ambaropamam /
GSP33samkupad_u:517: sudṛṣṭaśāstrānumitibhya īritaṃ vimucyate 'smin yadi niścito naraḥ // SamUpad_I,15.54 //
GSP33samkupad_u:519: pārthivaḥ kaṭhino dhātur dravo dehe smṛto 'mmayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:522: rūpālokavad iṣṭaṃ hi sajātīyārtham indriyam // SamUpad_I,16.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:524: tadvikalpārtham antasthaṃ mana ekādaśaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,16.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:526: jñātātmoktaḥ svarūpeṇa jyotiṣā vyañjayan sadā // SamUpad_I,16.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:528: vyatikīrṇo 'py asaṃkīrṇas tadvaj jñaḥ pratyayaiḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,16.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:529: sthito dīpo yathāyatnaḥ prāptaṃ sarvaṃ prakāśayet /
GSP33samkupad_u:530: śabdādyākārabuddhīr jñaḥ prāptās tadvat prapaśyati // SamUpad_I,16.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:534: draṣṭānyo duḥkhino dṛśyād draṣṭṛtvac ca na duḥkhy asau // SamUpad_I,16.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:535: duḥkhī syād duḥkhyahaṃmānād duḥkhino darśanān na vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:536: saṃhate 'ṅgādibhir draṣṭā duḥkhī duḥkhasya naiva saḥ // SamUpad_I,16.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:537: cakṣurvat karmakartṛtvaṃ syāc cen nānekam eva tat /
GSP33samkupad_u:538: saṃhataṃ ca tato nātmā draṣṭṛtvāt karmatāṃ vrajet // SamUpad_I,16.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:540: naikajñānaguṇatvāt tu jyotirvat tasya karmatā // SamUpad_I,16.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:542: bhede 'py evaṃ samatvāj jña ātmānaṃ naiva paśyati // SamUpad_I,16.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:543: yaddharmā yaḥ padārtho na tasyaiveyāt sa karmatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:544: na hy ātmānaṃ dahaty agnis tathā naiva prakāśayet // SamUpad_I,16.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:546: aṃśo 'py evaṃ samatvād dhi nirbhedatvān na yujyate // SamUpad_I,16.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:547: śūnyatāpi na yuktaivaṃ buddher anyena dṛśyatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:548: uktāto ghaṭavat tasyāḥ prāk siddheś ca vikalpataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:549: avikalpaṃ tad asty eva yat pūrvaṃ syād vikalpataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:550: vikalpotpattihetutvād yady asyaiva ca kāraṇam // SamUpad_I,16.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:552: hitvātmānaṃ paraṃ brahma vidyān muktaṃ sadābhayam // SamUpad_I,16.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:554: anyonyasminn asattvāc ca nāstīty etat trayaṃ tyajet // SamUpad_I,16.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:556: bhrāntiḥ syād ātmakarmeti kriyāṇāṃ saṃnipātataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:557: nimīlonmīlane sthāne vāyavye te na cakṣuṣaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:558: prakāśatvān manasy evaṃ buddhau na staḥ prakāśataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:562: gatā dhīs taṃ hi paśyañ jño dehamātra ivekṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:563: kṣaṇikaṃ hi tad atyarthaṃ dharmamātraṃ nirantaram /
GSP33samkupad_u:564: sādṛśyād dīpavat taddhīs tacchāntiḥ puruṣārthatā // SamUpad_I,16.23 //
GSP33samkupad_u:566: yeṣāṃ nāsti tataś cānyat pūrvāsaṃgatir ucyate // SamUpad_I,16.24 //
GSP33samkupad_u:568: kṣaṇikatvāc ca saṃskāraṃ naivādhatte kvacit tu dhiḥ // SamUpad_I,16.25 //
GSP33samkupad_u:570: sthāne vā kṣaṇikatvasya hānaṃ syān na tad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.26 //
GSP33samkupad_u:574: sarvārthe kṣaṇike kasmiṃs tathāpy anyānapekṣatā // SamUpad_I,16.28 //
GSP33samkupad_u:576: yogāc ca saṃskṛto yas tu so 'nyaṃ hīkṣitum arhati // SamUpad_I,16.29 //
GSP33samkupad_u:577: mṛṣādhyāsas tu yatra syāt tannāśas tatra no mataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:578: sarvanāśo bhaved yasya mokṣaḥ kasya phalaṃ vada // SamUpad_I,16.30 //
GSP33samkupad_u:579: asti tāvat svayaṃ nāma jñānaṃ vātmānyad eva vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:580: bhāvābhāvajñatas tasya nābhāvas tv adhigamyate // SamUpad_I,16.31 //
GSP33samkupad_u:581: yenādhigamyate 'bhāvas tat sat syāt tan na ced bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:582: bhāvābhāvānabhijñatvaṃ lokasya syān na ceṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.32 //
GSP33samkupad_u:583: sad asat sadasac ceti vikalpāt prāg yad iṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:584: tad advaitaṃ samatvāt tu nityaṃ cānyad vikalpitāt // SamUpad_I,16.33 //
GSP33samkupad_u:586: dvaitasya prāg asattvāc ca sadasattvādikalpanāt // SamUpad_I,16.34 //
GSP33samkupad_u:588: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum ityāder mama māyeti ca smṛteḥ // SamUpad_I,16.35 //
GSP33samkupad_u:589: viśuddhiś cāta evāsya vikalpāc ca vilakṣaṇāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:590: upādeyo na heyo 'ta ātmā nānyair akalpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.36 //
GSP33samkupad_u:594: avasthāntaravattve hi nāśo 'sya syān na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.38 //
GSP33samkupad_u:595: mokṣo 'vasthāntaraṃ yasya kṛtakaḥ sa calo hy ataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:596: na saṃyogo viyogo vā mokṣo yuktaḥ kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,16.39 //
GSP33samkupad_u:598: gamanāgamane caiva svarūpaṃ tu na hīyate // SamUpad_I,16.40 //
GSP33samkupad_u:600: anupāttaṃ svarūpaṃ hi svenātyaktaṃ tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,16.41 //
GSP33samkupad_u:601: svarūpatvān na sarvasya tyaktuṃ śakyo hy ananyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:603: ātmārthatvāc ca sarvasya nitya ātmaiva kevalaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:604: tyajet tasmāt kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sādhanaiḥ saha mokṣavit // SamUpad_I,16.43 //
GSP33samkupad_u:606: alābho 'nyātmalābhas tu tyajet tasmād anātmatām // SamUpad_I,16.44 //
GSP33samkupad_u:607: guṇānāṃ samabhāvasya bhraṃśo na hy upapadyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:608: avidyādeḥ prasuptatvān na cānyo hetur iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.45 //
GSP33samkupad_u:609: itaretarahetutve pravṛttiḥ syāt sadā na vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:610: niyamo na pravṛttīnāṃ guṇeṣv ātmani vā bhavet // SamUpad_I,16.46 //
GSP33samkupad_u:611: viśeṣo muktabaddhānāṃ tādarthye ca na yujyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:612: arthārthinoś ca saṃbandho nārthī jño netaro 'pi vā // SamUpad_I,16.47 //
GSP33samkupad_u:614: na yuktaṃ sāṃkhyaśāstre 'pi vikāre 'pi na yujyate // SamUpad_I,16.48 //
GSP33samkupad_u:618: nirnimitte tv anirmokṣaḥ pradhānasya prasajyate // SamUpad_I,16.50 //
GSP33samkupad_u:624: guṇānāṃ samavetatvaṃ jñānaṃ cen na viśeṣaṇāt // SamUpad_I,16.53 //
GSP33samkupad_u:626: sukhaṃ jñātaṃ mayety evaṃ tavājñānātmakatvataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.54 //
GSP33samkupad_u:628: bhedād anyasya kasmān na manaso vāviśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.55 //
GSP33samkupad_u:629: syān mālāparihāryā tu jñānaṃ cej jñeyatāṃ vrajet /
GSP33samkupad_u:630: yugapad vāpi cotpattir abhyupete 'nta iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.56 //
GSP33samkupad_u:632: nāśuddhiś cāpy asaṅgatvād asaṅgo hīti ca śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,16.57 //
GSP33samkupad_u:633: sūkṣmaikāgocarebhyaś ca na lipyata iti śruteḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:634: evaṃ tarhi na mokṣo 'sti bandhābhāvāt kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,16.58 //
GSP33samkupad_u:635: śāstrānarthakyam evaṃ syān na buddher bhrāntir iṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:636: bandho mokṣaś ca tannāśaḥ sa yathokto na cānyathā // SamUpad_I,16.59 //
GSP33samkupad_u:638: buddhir nānyo 'sti boddheti seyaṃ bhrāntir hi dhīgatā // SamUpad_I,16.60 //
GSP33samkupad_u:640: aviveko 'py anādyo 'yaṃ saṃsāro nānya iṣyate // SamUpad_I,16.61 //
GSP33samkupad_u:642: yeṣāṃ vastvantarāpattir mokṣo nāśas tu tair mataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.62 //
GSP33samkupad_u:643: avasthāntaram apy evam avikārān na yujyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:644: vikāre 'vayavitvaṃ syāt tato nāśo ghaṭādivat // SamUpad_I,16.63 //
GSP33samkupad_u:648: śakyante śataśo vaktuṃ doṣās tāsāṃ sahasraśaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.65 //
GSP33samkupad_u:649: api nindopapatteś ca yāny ato 'nyāni cety ataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:650: tyaktvāto hy anyaśāstroktīr matiṃ kuryād dṛḍhāṃ budhaḥ // SamUpad_I,16.66 //
GSP33samkupad_u:652: vedāntasyaiva tattvārthe vyāsasyāpi matau tathā // SamUpad_I,16.67 //
GSP33samkupad_u:653: iti praṇunnā dvayavādakalpanā nirātmavādāś ca tathā hi yuktitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:654: vyapetaśaṅkāḥ paravādataḥ sthirā mumukṣavo jñānapathe syur ity uta // SamUpad_I,16.63 //
GSP33samkupad_u:655: svasākṣikaṃ jñānam atīva nirmalaṃ vikalpanābhyo viparītam advayam /
GSP33samkupad_u:656: avāpya samyag yadi niścito bhaven niranvayo nirvṛtim eti śāśvatīm // SamUpad_I,16.69 //
GSP33samkupad_u:657: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ parāyaṇaṃ vyapetadoṣair abhimānavarjitaiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:658: samīkṣya kāryā matir ārjave sadā na tattvadṛk svānyamatir hi kaścana // SamUpad_I,16.70 //
GSP33samkupad_u:660: idaṃ viditvā paramaṃ hi pāvanaṃ na lipyate vyoma iveha karmabhiḥ // SamUpad_I,16.71 //
GSP33samkupad_u:662: guṇānvitāyānugatāya sarvadā pradeyam etat satataṃ mumukṣave // SamUpad_I,16.72 //
GSP33samkupad_u:663: parasya dehe na yathābhimānitā parasya tadvat paramārtham īkṣya ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:664: idaṃ hi vijñānam atīva nirmalaṃ saṃprāpya mukto 'tha bhavec ca sarvataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.73 //
GSP33samkupad_u:665: na hīha lābho 'bhyadhiko 'sti kaścana svarūpalābhāt sa ita hi nānyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:666: na deyam aindrād api rājyato 'dhikaṃ svarūpalābhaṃ tv aparīkṣya yatnataḥ // SamUpad_I,16.74 //
GSP33samkupad_u:668: ātmā jñeyaḥ paro hy ātmā yasmād anyan na vidyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:669: sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk śuddhas tasmai jñeyātmane namaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:671: brahma vedarahasyaṃ yais tān nityaṃ praṇato 'smy aham // SamUpad_I,17.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:673: praṇamya tān gurūn vakṣye brahmavidyāviniścayam // SamUpad_I,17.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:674: ātmalābhāt paro nānyo lābhaḥ kaścana vidyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:675: yadarthā vedavādāś ca smārtāś cāpi tu yāḥ kriyāḥ // SamUpad_I,4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:676: ātmārtho 'pi hi yo lābhaḥ sukhāyeṣṭo viparyayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:677: ātmalābhaḥ paraḥ prokto nityatvād brahmavedibhiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:678: svayaṃ labdhasvabhāvatvāl lābhas tasya na cānyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:679: anyāpekṣas tu yo lābhaḥ so 'nyadṛṣṭisamudbhavaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:680: anyadṛṣṭis tv avidyā syāt tannāśo mokṣa ucyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:681: jñānenaiva tu so 'pi syād virodhitvān na karmaṇā // SamUpad_I,17.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:683: pramāṇaṃ veda evātra jñānasyādhigame smṛtaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:684: jñānaikārthaparatvāt taṃ vākyam ekaṃ tato viduḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:685: ekatvaṃ hy ātmano jñeyaṃ vākyārthapratipattitaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:686: vācyabhedāt tu tadbhedaḥ kalpyo vācyo 'pi tacchruteḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:687: trayaṃ tv etat tataḥ proktaṃ rūpaṃ nāma ca karma ca // SamUpad_I,17.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:688: asad etat trayaṃ tasmād anyonyena hi kalpitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:689: kṛto varṇo yathā śabdāc chruto 'nyatra dhiyā bahiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:690: dṛṣṭaṃ cāpi yathā rūpaṃ buddheḥ śabdāya kalpate /
GSP33samkupad_u:691: evam etaj jagat sarvaṃ bhrāntibuddhivikalpitam // SamUpad_I,17.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:692: asad etat tato yuktaṃ saccinmātraṃ na kalpitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:693: vedaś cāpi sa evādyo vedyaś cānyas tu kalpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:694: yena vetti sa vedaḥ syāt svapne sarvaṃ tu māyayā /
GSP33samkupad_u:695: yena paśyati tac cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyate // SamUpad_I,17.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:696: yena svapnagato vakti sā vāg ghrāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:697: rasanasparśane caiva manaś cānyat tathendriyam // SamUpad_I,17.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:699: ādhibhedād yathā bhedo maṇer ekasya jāyate // SamUpad_I,17.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:700: jāgrataś ca tathā bhedo jñānasyāsya vikalpitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:701: buddhisthaṃ vyākaroty arthaṃ bhrāntyā tṛṣṇodbhavakriyaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:702: svapne yadvat prabodhe ca bahiś cāntas tathaiva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:704: yadāyaṃ kalpayed bhedaṃ tatkāmaḥ san yathākratuḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:705: yatkāmas tatkratur bhūtvā kṛtaṃ yat tat prapadyate // SamUpad_I,17.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:706: avidyāprabhavaṃ sarvam asat tasmād idaṃ jagat /
GSP33samkupad_u:707: tadvatā dṛśyate yasmāt suṣupte na ca gṛhyate // SamUpad_I,17.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:709: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena śāstre vidyā vidhīyate // SamUpad_I,17.21 //
GSP33samkupad_u:710: citte hy ādarśavad yasmāc chuddhe vidyā prakāśate /
GSP33samkupad_u:711: yamair nityaiś ca yajñaiś ca tapobhis tasya śodhanam // SamUpad_I,17.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:714: dṛṣṭaṃ jāgaritaṃ vidyāt smṛtaṃ svapnaṃ tad eva tu /
GSP33samkupad_u:715: suṣuptaṃ tadabhavaṃ ca svam ātmānaṃ paraṃ padam // SamUpad_I,17.24 //
GSP33samkupad_u:717: svātmabodhapradagdhaṃ syād bījaṃ dagdhaṃ yathābhavam // SamUpad_I,17.25 //
GSP33samkupad_u:718: tad evaikaṃ tridhā jñeyaṃ māyābījaṃ punaḥ kramāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:720: bījaṃ caikaṃ yathā bhinnaṃ prāṇasvapnādibhis tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:722: māyāhastinam āruhya māyāvy eko yathā vrajet /
GSP33samkupad_u:724: na hastī na tadārūḍho māyāvy anyo yathā sthitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:725: na prāṇādi na taddraṣṭā tathā jño 'nyaḥ sadā dṛśiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.29 //
GSP33samkupad_u:727: baddhākṣasyaiva sā māyāmāyāvy eva tato bhavet // SamUpad_I,17.30 //
GSP33samkupad_u:728: sākṣād eva sa vijñeyaḥ sākṣād ātmeti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:729: bhidyate hṛdayagranthir na ced ityāditaḥ śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.31 //
GSP33samkupad_u:731: sukhādibhyas tathānyatvād buddhyā vāpi kathaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,17.32 //
GSP33samkupad_u:732: adṛśyo 'pi yathā rāhuś candre bimbaṃ yathāmbhasi /
GSP33samkupad_u:733: sarvago 'pi tathaivātmā buddhāv eva sa gṛhyate // SamUpad_I,17.33 //
GSP33samkupad_u:734: bhānor bimbaṃ yathā cauṣṇyaṃ jale dṛṣṭaṃ na cāmbhasaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:735: buddhau bodho na taddharmas tathaiva syād vidharmataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.34 //
GSP33samkupad_u:736: cakṣuryuktā dhiyo vṛttir yā tāṃ paśyann aluptadṛk /
GSP33samkupad_u:737: dṛṣṭer draṣṭā bhaved ātmā śruteḥ śrotā tathā śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.35 //
GSP33samkupad_u:738: kevalāṃ manaso vṛttiṃ paśyan mantā mater ajaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:739: vijñātāluptaśaktitvāt tathā śāstraṃ na hīty ataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.36 //
GSP33samkupad_u:741: atra steneti śuddhatvaṃ tathānanvāgataṃ śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.37 //
GSP33samkupad_u:743: jñeyasyaiva viśeṣas tu yatra veti śruter mataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.38 //
GSP33samkupad_u:745: dṛṣṭer ātmasvarūpatvāt pratyakṣaṃ brahma tat smṛtam // SamUpad_I,17.39 //
GSP33samkupad_u:748: viṣayatvaṃ vikāritvaṃ nānātvaṃ vā na hīṣyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:749: na heyo nāpy upādeya ātmā nānyena vā tataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.41 //
GSP33samkupad_u:751: aham ātmeti yo vetti kuto nv eva bibheti saḥ // SamUpad_I,17.42 //
GSP33samkupad_u:753: tad asthūlādiśāstrebhyas tat tvam eveti niścayāt // SamUpad_I,17.43 //
GSP33samkupad_u:755: dehasyaiva tu jātyādis tasyāpy evaṃ hy anātmatā // SamUpad_I,17.44 //
GSP33samkupad_u:757: ātmajñānena heyā syād asurāṇām iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.45 //
GSP33samkupad_u:759: yathā jñānasya saṃprāptau tadvaj jātyādikarmaṇām // SamUpad_I,17.46 //
GSP33samkupad_u:760: yatkāmas tatkratur bhūtvā kṛtaṃ tv ajñaḥ prapadyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:761: yadā svātmadṛśaḥ kāmāḥ pramucyante 'mṛtas tadā // SamUpad_I,17.47 //
GSP33samkupad_u:763: na sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ vātmā nityatṛptaḥ śruter mataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.48 //
GSP33samkupad_u:765: nāto 'nyat karmaṇaḥ kāryaṃ tyajet tasmāt sasādhanam // SamUpad_I,17.49 //
GSP33samkupad_u:766: tāpāntatvād anityatvād ātmārthatvāc ca yā bahiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:767: saṃhṛtyātmani tāṃ prītiṃ satyārthī gurum āśrayet // SamUpad_I,17.50 //
GSP33samkupad_u:768: śāntaṃ prājñaṃ tathā muktaṃ niṣkriyaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:769: śruter ācāryavān veda tad viddhīti smṛtes tathā // SamUpad_I,17.51 //
GSP33samkupad_u:770: sa gurus tārayed yuktaṃ śiṣyaṃ śiṣyaguṇānvitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:772: dṛṣṭiḥ spṛṣṭiḥ śrutir ghrātir matir vijñātir eva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:773: śaktayo 'nyāś ca bhidyante cidrūpatve 'py upādhibhiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.53 //
GSP33samkupad_u:775: sarvagaḥ sarvadṛk śuddhaḥ sarvaṃ jānāti sarvadā // SamUpad_I,17.54 //
GSP33samkupad_u:777: jalendvādyupamābhis tu taddharmā ca vibhāvyate // SamUpad_I,17.55 //
GSP33samkupad_u:778: dṛṣṭvā bāhyaṃ nimīlyātha smṛtvā tat pravihāya ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:779: athonmīlyātmano dṛṣṭiṃ brahma prāpnoty anadhvagaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.56 //
GSP33samkupad_u:781: svātmastho nirguṇaḥ śuddho buddho muktaḥ svato hi saḥ // SamUpad_I,17.57 //
GSP33samkupad_u:783: sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk śuddha iti buddho na jāyate // SamUpad_I,17.58 //
GSP33samkupad_u:784: pūrvoktaṃ yat tamobījaṃ tan nāstīti viniścayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:785: tadabhāve kuto janma brahmaikatvaṃ vijānataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.59 //
GSP33samkupad_u:786: kṣīrāt sarpir yathoddhṛtya kṣiptaṃ tasmin na pūrvavat /
GSP33samkupad_u:787: buddhyāder jñas tathāsatyān na dehī pūrvavad bhavet // SamUpad_I,17.60 //
GSP33samkupad_u:788: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ ca rasādeḥ pañcakāt param /
GSP33samkupad_u:789: syām adṛśyādiśāstroktam ahaṃ brahmeti nirbhayaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.61 //
GSP33samkupad_u:792: nāmādibhyaḥ pare bhūmni svārājye cet sthito 'dvaye /
GSP33samkupad_u:793: praṇamet kaṃ tadātmajño na kāryaṃ karmaṇā tadā // SamUpad_I,17.63 //
GSP33samkupad_u:794: virāḍ vaiśvānaro bāhyaḥ smarann antaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:795: pravilīne tu sarvasmin prājño 'vyākṛtam ucyate // SamUpad_I,17.64 //
GSP33samkupad_u:797: satyo jñaś cāham ity evaṃ satyasandho vimucyate // SamUpad_I,17.65 //
GSP33samkupad_u:798: bhārūpatvād yathā bhānor nāhorātre tathaiva tu /
GSP33samkupad_u:799: jñānājñāne na me syātāṃ cidrūpatvāviśeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.66 //
GSP33samkupad_u:801: brahmaṇo me na heyaṃ syād grāhyaṃ veti ca saṃsmaret // SamUpad_I,17.67 //
GSP33samkupad_u:802: aham eva ca bhūteṣu sarveṣv eko nabho yathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:803: mayi sarvāṇi bhūtāni paśyann evaṃ na jāyate // SamUpad_I,17.68 //
GSP33samkupad_u:804: na bāhyaṃ madhyato vāntar vidyate 'nyat svataḥ kvacit /
GSP33samkupad_u:805: abāhyāntaḥśruteḥ kiṃcit tasmāc chuddhaḥ svayaṃprabhaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.69 //
GSP33samkupad_u:807: avijñātādiśāstrāc ca naiva jñeyo hy ato 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,17.70 //
GSP33samkupad_u:808: sarvasyātmāham eveti brahma ced viditaṃ param /
GSP33samkupad_u:809: sa ātmā sarvabhūtānām ātmā hy eṣām iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,17.71 //
GSP33samkupad_u:810: jīvaś cet param ātmānaṃ svātmānaṃ devam añjasā /
GSP33samkupad_u:811: devopāsyaḥ sa devānāṃ paśutvāc ca nivartate // SamUpad_I,17.72 //
GSP33samkupad_u:812: aham eva sadātmajñaḥ śūnyas tv anyair yathāmbaram /
GSP33samkupad_u:813: ity evaṃ satyasaṃdhatvād asaddhātā na badhyate // SamUpad_I,17.73 //
GSP33samkupad_u:814: kṛpaṇās te 'nyathaivāto vidur brahma paraṃ hi ye /
GSP33samkupad_u:815: svarāḍ yo 'nanyadṛk svasthas tasya devā asan vaśe // SamUpad_I,17.74 //
GSP33samkupad_u:817: om ity evaṃ svam ātmānaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhaṃ prapadyatha // SamUpad_I,17.75 //
GSP33samkupad_u:819: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaḥ sarvaṃ sakṛjjyotir anāmayam // SamUpad_I,17.76 //
GSP33samkupad_u:821: svam ātmānaṃ paraṃ vidyād vimuktaṃ sarvabandhanaiḥ // SamUpad_I,17.77 //
GSP33samkupad_u:822: akurvan sarvakṛc chuddhas tiṣṭhann atyeti dhāvataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:823: māyayā sarvaśaktitvād ajaḥ san bahudhā mataḥ // SamUpad_I,17.78 //
GSP33samkupad_u:826: nirguṇaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nityaṃ nirdvandvaṃ yan nirāmayam /
GSP33samkupad_u:827: śuddhaṃ buddhaṃ tathā muktaṃ tad brahmāsmīti dhārayet // SamUpad_I,17.80 //
GSP33samkupad_u:828: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ yata idam ubhayaṃ heyam ekaṃ dvayaṃ ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:829: jñeyājñeyābhyatītaṃ paramam adhigataṃ tattvam ekaṃ viśuddham /
GSP33samkupad_u:831: sarvajñaḥ sarvakṛt syād bhavabhayarahito brāhmaṇo 'vāptakṛtyaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.81 //
GSP33samkupad_u:832: na svayaṃ svasya nānyaś ca nānyasyātmā ca heyagaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:833: upādeyo na cāpy evam iti samyaṅmatiḥ smṛtā // SamUpad_I,17.82 //
GSP33samkupad_u:836: rahasyaṃ sarvavedānāṃ devānāṃ cāpi yat param /
GSP33samkupad_u:837: pavitraṃ paramaṃ hy etat tad etat saṃprakāśitam // SamUpad_I,17.84 //
GSP33samkupad_u:838: naitad deyam aśāntāya rahasyaṃ jñānam uttamam /
GSP33samkupad_u:840: dadataś cātmano jñānaṃ niṣkriyo 'nyo na vidyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:841: jñānam icchan bhavet tasmād yuktaḥ śiṣyaguṇaiḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,17.86 //
GSP33samkupad_u:842: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā jñātā yasmād anyan na vidyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:843: sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktir yas tasmai jñānātmane namaḥ // SamUpad_I,17.87 //
GSP33samkupad_u:849: pramathya vajropamayuktisaṃbhṛtaiḥ śruter arātiñ śataśo vaco 'sibhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:850: rarakṣa vedārthanidhiṃ viśāladhīr namo yatīndrāya guror garīyase // SamUpad_I,18.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:851: nityamuktaḥ sad evāsmīty evaṃ cen na bhaven matiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:852: kimarthaṃ śrāvayaty evaṃ mātṛvac chrutir ādṛtā // SamUpad_I,18.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:853: siddhād evāham ity asmād yuṣmaddharmo niṣidhyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:854: rajjvām ivāhidhīr yuktyā tat tvam ityādiśāsanaiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:856: viṣāpoho yathā dhyānād dhnutiḥ syāt pāpmanas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:858: tayor ajñānajasyaiva tyāgo yuktataro mataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:859: sad asmīti pramāṇotthā dhīr anyā tannibhodbhavā /
GSP33samkupad_u:861: kartā bhokteti yac chāstraṃ lokabuddhyanuvādi tat /
GSP33samkupad_u:862: sad asmīti śruter jātā bādhyate 'nyaitayaiva dhīḥ // SamUpad_I,18.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:863: sad eva tvam asīty ukte nātmano muktatāṃ sthirām /
GSP33samkupad_u:865: sakṛd uktaṃ na gṛhṇāti vākyārthajño 'pi yo bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:866: apekṣate 'ta evānyad avocāma dvayaṃ hi tat // SamUpad_I,18.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:868: aviruddho bhavet tāvad yāvat saṃvedyatādṛḍhā // SamUpad_I,18.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:869: ceṣṭitaṃ ca tathā mithyā svacchandaḥ pratipadyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:870: prasaṃkhyānam ataḥ kāryaṃ yāvad ātmānubhūyate // SamUpad_I,18.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:871: sad asmīti ca vijñānam akṣajo bādhate dhruvam /
GSP33samkupad_u:872: śabdotthaṃ dṛḍhasaṃskāro doṣaiś cākrṣyate bahiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:876: yadi vā dṛśyate kaścid vākyārthaśrutimātrataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:878: caryā no 'śāstrasaṃvedyā syād aniṣṭaṃ tathā sati // SamUpad_I,18.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:879: sad asīti phalaṃ coktvā vidheyaṃ sādhanaṃ yataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:880: na tad anyat prasaṃkhyānāt prasiddhārtham iheṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:884: kriyāsādhyaṃ purā śrāvyaṃ na mokṣo nityasiddhataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:886: ahaṃkartrā tathādhyastaṃ nityāduḥkhe sva ātmani // SamUpad_I,18.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:890: malādhyāsaniṣedhau khe kriyete ca yathābudhaiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:891: prāptaś cet pratiṣidhyeta mokṣo 'nityo bhaved dhruvam /
GSP33samkupad_u:893: saṃbhāvyo gocare śabdaḥ pratyayo vā na cānyathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:894: na saṃbhāvyau tadātmatvād ahaṃkartus tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,18.24 //
GSP33samkupad_u:896: neti netīti tat sarvaṃ sāhaṃkartrā niṣidhyate // SamUpad_I,18.25 //
GSP33samkupad_u:898: sākṣāt sarvāntaraḥ sākṣī cetā nityo 'guṇo 'dvayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.26 //
GSP33samkupad_u:900: ātmātmīyaṃ dvayaṃ cātaḥ syād ahaṃmamagocaraḥ // SamUpad_I,18.27 //
GSP33samkupad_u:901: jātikarmādimattvād dhi tasmiñ śabdās tv ahaṃkṛti /
GSP33samkupad_u:902: na kaścid vartate śabdas tadabhāvāt sva ātmani // SamUpad_I,18.28 //
GSP33samkupad_u:903: ābhāso yatra tatraiva śabdāḥ pratyagdṛśiṃ sthitāḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:904: lakṣayeyur na sākṣāt tam abhidadhyuḥ kathaṃcana // SamUpad_I,18.29 //
GSP33samkupad_u:905: nahy ajātyādimān kaścid arthaḥ śabdair nirūpyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:911: mukhavat sthita ātmānyo 'viviktau tau tathaiva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:912: saṃsārī ca sa ity eka ābhāso yas tv ahaṃkṛti // SamUpad_I,18.33 //
GSP33samkupad_u:913: vastu cchāyā smṛter anyan mādhuryādi ca kāraṇam /
GSP33samkupad_u:914: jñaikadeśo vikāro vā tadābhāsāśrayaḥ pare // SamUpad_I,18.34 //
GSP33samkupad_u:917: ity evaṃ saugatā āhus tatra nyāyo vicāryatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:918: saṃsāriṇāṃ kathā tv āstāṃ prakṛtaṃ tv adhunocyate // SamUpad_I,18.36 //
GSP33samkupad_u:919: mukhābhāso ya ādarśe dharmo nānyatarasya saḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:920: dvayor ekasya ced dharmo viyukte 'nyatare bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.37 //
GSP33samkupad_u:921: mukhena vyapadeśāt sa mukhasyaiveti cen matam /
GSP33samkupad_u:922: nādarśānuvidhānāc ca mukhe saty avibhāvataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.38 //
GSP33samkupad_u:923: dvayor eveti cet tan na dvayor evāpy adarśanāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:924: adṛṣṭasya sato dṛṣṭiḥ syād rāhoś candrasūryayoḥ // SamUpad_I,18.39 //
GSP33samkupad_u:925: rāhoḥ prāg eva vastutvaṃ siddhaṃ śāstrapramāṇataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:926: chāyāpakṣe tv avastutvaṃ tasya syāt pūrvayuktitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.40 //
GSP33samkupad_u:928: na hy arthāntaraniṣṭhaṃ sad vākyam arthāntaraṃ vadet // SamUpad_I,18.41 //
GSP33samkupad_u:930: chāyāyā na tv adṛṣṭatvād apām eva ca darśanāt // SamUpad_I,18.42 //
GSP33samkupad_u:932: gamyate śāstrayuktibhyām ābhāsāsattvam eva ca // SamUpad_I,18.43 //
GSP33samkupad_u:934: nācititvād ahaṃkartuḥ kasya saṃsāritā bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.44 //
GSP33samkupad_u:936: kūṭasthenātmanā nityam ātmavān ātmanīva saḥ // SamUpad_I,18.45 //
GSP33samkupad_u:937: rajjusarpo yathā rajjvā sātmakaḥ prāg vivekataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:938: avastusann api hy eṣa kūṭasthenātmanā tathā // SamUpad_I,18.46 //
GSP33samkupad_u:940: sukhī duḥkhī ca saṃsārī nitya eveti kecana // SamUpad_I,18.47 //
GSP33samkupad_u:942: ahaṃkartāram ātmeti manyante te nirāgamāḥ // SamUpad_I,18.48 //
GSP33samkupad_u:946: syāc cet taṃ jñānaśabdaiś ca vedaḥ śāstīti yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.50 //
GSP33samkupad_u:949: nānayor dvyāśrayatvaṃ tu loke dṛṣṭaṃ smṛtau tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:950: jānātyartheṣu ko hetur dvyāśrayatve nigadyatām // SamUpad_I,18.52 //
GSP33samkupad_u:951: ātmābhāsas tu tiṅvācyo dhātvarthaś ca dhiyaḥ kriyā /
GSP33samkupad_u:952: ubhayaṃ cāvivekena jānātīty ucyate mṛṣā // SamUpad_I,18.53 //
GSP33samkupad_u:953: na buddher avabodho 'sti nātmano vidyate kriyā /
GSP33samkupad_u:954: ato nānyatarasyāpi jānātīti ca yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.54 //
GSP33samkupad_u:955: nāpy ato bhāvaśabdena jñaptir ity api yujyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:956: na hy ātmā vikriyāmātro nitya ātmetiśāsanāt // SamUpad_I,18.55 //
GSP33samkupad_u:957: na buddher buddhivācyatvaṃ karaṇaṃ na hy akartṛkam /
GSP33samkupad_u:958: nāpi jñāyata ity evaṃ karmaśabdair nirucyate // SamUpad_I,18.56 //
GSP33samkupad_u:959: na yeṣām eka evātmā nirduḥkho 'vikriyaḥ sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:960: teṣāṃ syāc chabdavācyatvaṃ jñeyatvaṃ cātmanaḥ sadā // SamUpad_I,18.57 //
GSP33samkupad_u:963: hanta tarhi na mukhyārtho nāpi gauṇaḥ kathaṃcana /
GSP33samkupad_u:964: jānātītyādiśabdasya gatir vācyā tathāpi tu // SamUpad_I,18.59 //
GSP33samkupad_u:966: sā ca neṣṭā tato grāhyā gatir asya prasiddhitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.60 //
GSP33samkupad_u:970: gatiśūnyaṃ na vedo 'yaṃ pramāṇaṃ saṃvadaty uta // SamUpad_I,18.62 //
GSP33samkupad_u:972: mukhasya pratibimbo hi mukhākāreṇa dṛśyate // SamUpad_I,18.63 //
GSP33samkupad_u:974: jānātīti kriyāṃ sarvo loko vakti svabhavataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.64 //
GSP33samkupad_u:975: buddheḥ kartṛtvam adhyasya jānātīti jña ucyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:976: tathā caitanyam adhyasya jñatvaṃ buddher ihocyate // SamUpad_I,18.65 //
GSP33samkupad_u:977: svarūpaṃ cātmano jñānaṃ nityaṃ jyotiḥ śruter yataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:978: na buddhyā kriyate tasmān nātmanānyena vā sadā // SamUpad_I,18.66 //
GSP33samkupad_u:980: vadanti jñānakartṛtvaṃ tadvad buddhes tathātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.67 //
GSP33samkupad_u:981: bauddhais tu pratyayair evaṃ kriyamāṇaiś ca cinnibhaiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:982: mohitāḥ kriyate jñānam ity āhus tārkikā janāḥ // SamUpad_I,18.68 //
GSP33samkupad_u:984: jānātītyādiśabdaś ca pratyayo yā ca tatsmṛtiḥ // SamUpad_I,18.69 //
GSP33samkupad_u:987: buddhes tu pratyayās tasmād ātmābhāsena dīpitāḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:989: svayam evāvabhāsyante grāhakāḥ svayam eva ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:990: ity evaṃ grāhakāstitvaṃ pratiṣedhanti saugatāḥ // SamUpad_I,18.72 //
GSP33samkupad_u:991: yady evaṃ nānyadṛśyās te kiṃ tadvāraṇam ucyatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:992: bhāvābhāvau hi teṣāṃ yau nānyagrāhyau sadā yadi // SamUpad_I,18.73 //
GSP33samkupad_u:993: anvayī grāhakas teṣām ity etad api tatsamam /
GSP33samkupad_u:994: acititvasya tulyatvād anyasmin grāhake sati // SamUpad_I,18.74 //
GSP33samkupad_u:995: adhyakṣasya samīpe tu siddhiḥ syād iti cen matam /
GSP33samkupad_u:997: arthī duḥkhī ca yaḥ śrotā sa tv adhyakṣo 'thavetaraḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:998: adhyakṣasya ca duḥkhitvam arthitvaṃ ca na te matam // SamUpad_I,18.76 //
GSP33samkupad_u:999: kartādhyakṣaṃ sad asmīti naiva sadgraham arhati /
GSP33samkupad_u:1000: sad evāsīti mithyoktiḥ śruter api na yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.77 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1001: avivicyobhayaṃ vakti śrutiś cet syād grahas tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1002: asmadas tu vivicyaiva tvam eveti vaded yadi // SamUpad_I,18.78 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1004: tvam ity adhyakṣaniṣṭhaś ced ahamadhyakṣayoḥ katham // SamUpad_I,18.79 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1005: saṃbandho vācya evātra yena tvam iti lakṣayet /
GSP33samkupad_u:1008: ātmādhyakṣo mamāstīti saṃbandhāgrahaṇe na dhīḥ // SamUpad_I,18.81 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1009: saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ śāstrād iti cen manyase na hi /
GSP33samkupad_u:1010: pūrvoktāḥ syus tridhā doṣā graho vā syān mameti ca // SamUpad_I,18.82 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1011: adṛśir dṛśirūpeṇa bhāti buddhir yadā sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1012: pratyayā api tasyāḥ syus taptāyovisphuliṅgavat // SamUpad_I,18.83 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1013: ābhāsas tadabhāvaś ca dṛśeḥ sīmno na cānyathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1014: lokasya yuktitaḥ syātāṃ tadgrahaś ca tathā sati // SamUpad_I,18.84 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1016: mukhābhāsavad ity etad ādarśe tan nirākṛtam // SamUpad_I,18.85 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1017: kṛṣṇāyo rohitābhāsam ity etad dṛṣṭam ucyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1018: dṛṣṭadārṣṭāntatulyatvaṃ na tu sarvātmanā kvacit // SamUpad_I,18.86 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1020: mukhābhāso yathādarśa ābhāsaś codito mṛṣā // SamUpad_I,18.87 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1022: dehasyāpi prasaṅgaḥ syāc cakṣurādes tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,18.88 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1023: tad apy astv iti cet tan na lokāyatikasaṃgateḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1024: na ca dhīr dṛśir asmīti yady ābhāso na cetasi // SamUpad_I,18.89 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1025: sad asmīti dhiyo 'bhāve vyarthaṃ syāt tat tvam asy api /
GSP33samkupad_u:1026: yuṣmadasmadvivekajñe syād arthavad idaṃ vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.90 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1027: mamedaṃpratyayau jñeyau yuṣmady eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1028: aham ity asmadīṣṭaḥ syād ayam asmīti cobhayoḥ // SamUpad_I,18.91 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1030: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ tathā grāhyaṃ hi yuktitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.92 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1031: mamedaṃ dvayam apy etan madhyamasya viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1032: dhanī gomān yathā tadvad deho 'haṃkartur eva ca // SamUpad_I,18.93 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1033: buddhyārūḍhaṃ sadā sarvaṃ sāhaṃkartrā ca sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1034: tasmāt sarvāvabhāso jñaḥ kiṃcid apy aspṛśan sadā // SamUpad_I,18.94 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1036: avivekadhiyām asti nāsti sarvaṃ vivekinām // SamUpad_I,18.95 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1038: syād etad aham ity atra yuktir evāvadhāraṇe // SamUpad_I,18.96 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1039: nādrākṣam aham iti asmin suṣupte 'nyan manāg api /
GSP33samkupad_u:1040: na vārayati dṛṣṭiṃ svāṃ pratyayaṃ tu niṣedhati // SamUpad_I,18.97 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1041: svayaṃjyotir na hi draṣṭur ity evaṃ saṃvido 'stitām /
GSP33samkupad_u:1042: kauṭasthyaṃ ca tathā tasyāḥ pratyayasya ca luptatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:1043: svayam evābravīc chāstraṃ pratyayāvagatī pṛthak // SamUpad_I,18.98 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1045: śrutis tat tvam asīty āha śrotur mohāpanuttaye // SamUpad_I,18.99 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1047: tasya viṣṇutvasaṃbodhe na yatnāntaram ūcivān // SamUpad_I,18.100 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1049: saivoktā sad asīty evaṃ phalaṃ tatra vimuktatā // SamUpad_I,18.101 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1050: śrutamātre na cet tat syāt kāryaṃ tatra bhaved dhruvam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1051: vyavahārāt purāpīṣṭaḥ sadbhāvaḥ svayam ātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.102 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1055: jāyetaiva pramā tatra svātmany eva na saṃśayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.104 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1056: kiṃ sad evāham asmīti kiṃ vānyat pratipadyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1057: sad eva ced ahaṃśabdaḥ satā mukhyārtha iṣyatām // SamUpad_I,18.105 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1059: tasmān mukhyagrahe nāsti vāraṇāvagater iha // SamUpad_I,18.106 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1061: tayor acitimattvāc ca caitanye kalpyate phalam // SamUpad_I,18.107 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1064: ādarśas tu yadābhāso mukhākāraḥ sa eva saḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1065: yathaivaṃ pratyayādarśo yadābhāsas tadā hy aham // SamUpad_I,18.109 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1066: ity evaṃ pratipattiḥ syāt sad asmīti ca nānyathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1067: tat tvam ity upadeśo 'pi dvārābhāvād anarthakaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.110 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1068: śrotuḥ syād upadeśaś ced arthavattvaṃ tathā bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:1069: adhyakṣasya na ced iṣṭaṃ śrotṛtvaṃ kasya tad bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.111 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1070: adhyakṣasya samīpe buddher eveti cen matam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1071: na tatkṛtopakāro 'sti kāṣṭhād yadvan na kalpyate // SamUpad_I,18.112 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1072: buddhau cet tatkṛtaḥ kaścin nanv evaṃ pariṇāmitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1073: ābhāse 'pi ca ko doṣaḥ sati śrutyādyanugrahe // SamUpad_I,18.113 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1075: sarpādeś ca tathāvocam ādarśe ca mukhatvavat // SamUpad_I,18.114 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1077: mukhādes tu pṛthaksiddhir iha tv anyonyasaṃśrayaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.115 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1080: naivaṃ svapne pṛthaksiddheḥ pratyayasya dṛśes tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1081: rathādes tatra śūnyatvāt pratyayasyātmanā grahaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.117 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1083: jāyate sa yadākāraḥ sa bāhyo viṣayo mataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.118 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1085: ākāro yatra cārpyeta karaṇaṃ tad ihocyate // SamUpad_I,18.119 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1087: trayam etad vivicyātra yo jānāti sa ātmavit // SamUpad_I,18.120 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1089: ekaivāvagatis teṣu bhedas tu pratyayārpitaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.121 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1090: ādhibhedād yathā bhedo maṇer avagates tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1091: aśuddhiḥ pariṇāmaś ca sarvaṃ pratyayasaṃśrayāt // SamUpad_I,18.122 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1093: āparokṣyāt tad evoktam anumānaṃ pradīpavat // SamUpad_I,18.123 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1094: kim ajñaṃ grāhayet kaścit pramāṇena tu kenacit /
GSP33samkupad_u:1095: vinaiva tu pramāṇena nivṛttyānyasya śeṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.124 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1098: cetanas tvaṃ kathaṃ deha iti cen nāprasiddhitaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1101: tulya evaṃ prabodhaḥ syād ajñasyāsattvavādinā // SamUpad_I,18.127 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1102: aham ajñāsiṣaṃ cedam iti lokasmṛter iha /
GSP33samkupad_u:1103: karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca siddhās tv ekakṣaṇe kila // SamUpad_I,18.128 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1105: krameṇa grahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ smṛteḥ paścāt tathaiva ca // SamUpad_I,18.129 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1106: ajñāsiṣam idaṃ māṃ cety apekṣā jāyate dhruvam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1108: ātmano grahaṇe cāpi trayāṇām iha saṃbhavāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:1109: ātmany āsaktakartṛtvaṃ na syāt karaṇakarmaṇoḥ // SamUpad_I,18.131 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1110: vyāptum iṣṭaṃ ca yat kartuḥ kriyayā karma tat smṛtam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1111: ato hi kartṛtantratvaṃ tasyeṣṭaṃ nānyatantratā // SamUpad_I,18.132 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1112: śabdād vānumiter vāpi pramāṇād vā tato 'nyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1113: siddhiḥ sarvapadārthānāṃ syād ajñaṃ prati nānyathā // SamUpad_I,18.133 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1114: adhyakṣasyāpi siddhiḥ syāt pramāṇena vinaiva vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1115: vinā svasya prasiddhis tu nājñaṃ praty upayujyate // SamUpad_I,18.134 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1116: tasyaivājñatvam iṣṭaṃ cej jñātatve 'nyā mitir bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:1117: anyasyaivājñatāyāṃ ca tadvijñāne dhruvā bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.135 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1118: jñātatā svātmalābho vā siddhiḥ syād anyad eva vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1119: jñātatve 'nantaroktau tvaṃ pakṣau saṃsmartum arhasi // SamUpad_I,18.136 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1120: siddhiḥ syāt svātmalābhaś ced yatnas tatra nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1125: spaṣṭatāspaṣṭate syātām anyasyaiva na cātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.139 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1126: adraṣṭur naiva cāndhasya spaṣṭībhāvo ghaṭasya tu /
GSP33samkupad_u:1128: anubhūteḥ kim antasmin syāt tavāpekṣayā vada /
GSP33samkupad_u:1129: anubhavitarīṣṭā syāt so 'py anubhūtir eva naḥ // SamUpad_I,18.141 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1132: [bhūtir yeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate / ]
GSP33samkupad_u:1133: sattvaṃ nāśitvam asyāś cet sakartṛtvaṃ tatheṣyatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:1134: na kaścic ceṣyate dharma iti cet pakṣahānatā // SamUpad_I,18.143 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1136: na bhūtes tarhi nāśitvaṃ svālakṣaṇyaṃ hi te // SamUpad_I,18.144 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1138: agor asattvaṃ gotvaṃ te na tu tad goḥ svalakṣaṇam // SamUpad_I,18.145 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1139: kṣaṇavācyo 'pi yo 'rthaḥ syāt so 'py anyābhāva eva te /
GSP33samkupad_u:1140: bhedābhāve 'py abhāvasya bhedo nāmabhir iṣyate // SamUpad_I,18.146 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1141: nāmabhedair anekatvam ekasya syāt kathaṃ tava /
GSP33samkupad_u:1142: apoho yadi bhinnānāṃ vṛttis tasya kathaṃ gavi // SamUpad_I,18.147 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1143: nābhāvā bhedakāḥ sarve viśeṣā vā kadācana /
GSP33samkupad_u:1146: kriyākārakabhedais tad abhyupeyaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.149 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1147: tasmān nīlaṃ tathā pītaṃ ghaṭādir vā viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1148: saṃvidas tad upetyaṃ syād yena cāpy anubhūyate // SamUpad_I,18.150 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1149: rūpādīnāṃ yathānyaḥ syād grāhyatvād grāhakas tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1150: pratyayasya tathānyaṃ syād vyañjakatvāc ca dīpavat // SamUpad_I,18.151 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1152: adhyakṣyeṇa tu dṛśyena muktvānyo draṣṭṛdṛśyatām // SamUpad_I,18.152 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1153: adhyakṣeṇa kṛtā dṛṣṭir dṛśyaṃ vyāpnoty athāpi vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1154: nityādhyakṣakṛtaḥ kaścid upakāro bhaved dhiyām // SamUpad_I,18.153 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1155: sa coktas tannibhatvaṃ prāk saṃvyāptiś ca ghaṭādiṣu /
GSP33samkupad_u:1157: ālokastho ghaṭo yadvad buddhyārūḍho bhavet tathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1158: dhīvyāptiḥ syād ghaṭāroho dhiyo vyāptau kramo bhavet // SamUpad_I,18.155 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1162: saty eva grāhyaśeṣe ca pariṇāmī sa cittavat // SamUpad_I,18.157 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1163: adhyakṣo 'ham iti jñānaṃ buddher eva viniścayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1164: nādhyakṣasyāviśeṣatvān na tasyāsti paro yataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.158 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1165: kartrā ced aham ity evam anubhūyeta muktatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1172: naiva hy anyasya dāhādāv anyo duḥkhī bhavet kvacit // SamUpad_I,18.162 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1173: asparśatvād adehatvān nāhaṃ dāhyo yataḥ sadā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1174: tasmān mithyābhimānotthaṃ mṛte putre mṛtir yathā // SamUpad_I,18.163 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1175: kuṇḍaly aham iti hy etad bādhyetaiva vivekinā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1176: duḥkhīti pratyayas tadvat kevalāhaṃdhiyā sadā // SamUpad_I,18.164 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1177: siddhe suḥkhitva iṣṭaṃ syāt taccaktitvaṃ sadātmanaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1179: asparśo 'pi yathā sparśam acalaś calanādi ca /
GSP33samkupad_u:1180: avivekāt tathā duḥkhaṃ mānasaṃ cātmanīkṣate // SamUpad_I,18.166 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1183: tadānudṛśyate duḥkhaṃ naiścalye naiva tasya tat /
GSP33samkupad_u:1184: pratyagātmani tasmāt tad duḥkhaṃ naivopapadyate // SamUpad_I,18.168 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1188: daśamas tvam asīty evaṃ vākyaṃ syāt pratyagātmani // SamUpad_I,18.170 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1192: apaśyañ jñātum evecchet svam ātmānaṃ janas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.172 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1194: viviktaṃ dṛśim ātmānaṃ nekṣate daśamaṃ yathā // SamUpad_I,18.173 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1197: idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścāt padaṃ vākye bhaved iti /
GSP33samkupad_u:1198: niyamo naiva vede 'sti padasāṃgatyam arthataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.175 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1201: yadā nityeṣu vākyeṣu padārthas tu vivicyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1202: vākyārthajñānasaṃkrāntyai tadā praśno na yujyate // SamUpad_I,18.177 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1204: smṛtyabhāve na vākyārtho jñātuṃ śakyo bi kenacit // SamUpad_I,18.178 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1206: vyajyate naiva vākyārtho nityamukto 'ham ity ataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.179 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1214: akṣajādinibhair etaiḥ kathaṃ syād vākyabādhanam // SamUpad_I,18.183 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1215: duḥkhy asmīti sati jñāne nirduḥkhīti na jāyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1218: tatkālabhāvibhir vākyair na bādhaḥ kriyate yadi // SamUpad_I,18.185 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1219: samāptes tarhi duḥkhasya prāk ca tadbādha iṣyatām /
GSP33samkupad_u:1220: na hi duḥkhasya saṃtāno bhrānter vā dṛśyate kvacit // SamUpad_I,18.186 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1221: pratyagātmana ātmatvaṃ duḥkhy asmīty asya bādhayā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1222: daśamaṃ navam asyeva veda ced aviruddhatā // SamUpad_I,18.187 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1226: evaṃ nirduḥkham ātmānam akriyaṃ pratipadyate // SamUpad_I,18.189 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1228: daśamas tvam asīty asmād yathaivaṃ pratyagātmani // SamUpad_I,18.190 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1229: prabodhena yathā svāpnaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ nivartate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1232: tattvamasyādivākyeṣu na tv evam avirodhataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.192 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1233: vākye tat tvam asīty asmiñ jñātārthaṃ tadasidvayam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1235: tattvamos tulyanīḍārtham asīty etat padaṃ bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:1236: tacchabdaḥ pratyagātmārthas tacchabdārthas tvamas tathā // SamUpad_I,18.194 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1238: evaṃ ca netinetyarthaṃ gamayetāṃ parasparam // SamUpad_I,18.195 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1239: evaṃ tat tvam asīty asya gamyamāne phale katham /
GSP33samkupad_u:1241: tasmād ādyantamadhyeṣu kurv ity etad virodhy ataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1242: na kalpyam aśrutatvāc ca śrutatyāgo 'py anarthakaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.197 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1243: yathānubhūyate tṛptir bhujer vākyān na gamyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1246: pratyagātmani na tv evaṃ saṃkhyāprāptivad adhruvam // SamUpad_I,18.199 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1249: nivṛttāv ahamaḥ siddhaḥ svātmano 'nubhavaś ca naḥ // SamUpad_I,18.200 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1250: buddhīnāṃ viṣayo duḥkhaṃ tā yasya viṣayā matāḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1251: kuto 'sya duḥkhasaṃbandho dṛśeḥ syāt pratyagātmanaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.201 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1254: aśanāyādinirmuktaḥ siddho mokṣas tvam eva saḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1255: śrotavyādi tavety etad viruddhaṃ katham ucyate // SamUpad_I,18.203 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1256: setsyatīty eva cet tat syāc chravaṇādi tadā bhavet /
GSP33samkupad_u:1257: mokṣasyānityataivaṃ syād virodhy evānyathā vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.204 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1258: śrotṛśrotavyayor bhedo yadīṣṭaḥ syād bhaved idam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1259: iṣṭārthakopa evaṃ syān na yuktaṃ sarvathā vacaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.205 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1260: siddho mokṣo 'ham ity evaṃ jñātvātmānaṃ bhaved yadi /
GSP33samkupad_u:1261: cikīrṣur yaḥ sa mūḍhātmā śāstraṃ codghāṭayaty api // SamUpad_I,18.206 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1262: na hi siddhasya kartavyaṃ sakāryasya na siddhatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1263: ubhayālambanaṃ kurvann ātmānaṃ vañcayaty asau // SamUpad_I,18.207 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1264: siddho mokṣas tvam ity etad vastumātraṃ pradarśyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1265: śrotus tathātvavijñāne pravṛttiḥ syāt kathaṃ tv iti // SamUpad_I,18.208 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1267: kartā duḥkhī ca mā bhūvam iti yatno bhavet tataḥ // SamUpad_I,18.209 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1270: nirduḥkho niṣkriyo 'kāmaḥ siddho mokṣo 'ham ity api /
GSP33samkupad_u:1271: gṛhītvaiva viruddhārtham ādadhyāt katham eva saḥ // SamUpad_I,18.211 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1273: ato me viparītasya tad bhavān vaktum arhati // SamUpad_I,18.212 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1275: pramāṇena virodhī yaḥ so 'trārthaḥ praśnam arhati // SamUpad_I,18.213 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1276: ahaṃ nirmukta ity eṣa sad asīty anyamānajaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1279: kathaṃ hīdaṃ nivarteta duḥkhaṃ sarvātmanā mama // SamUpad_I,18.215 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1281: śruteḥ svātmani nāśaṅkā prāmāṇye sati vidyate // SamUpad_I,18.216 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1283: vaktavyaṃ tu tathārthaṃ syād virodhe 'sati kenacit // SamUpad_I,18.217 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1285: avijñātaṃ vijānatāṃ vijñātāram iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_I,18.218 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1287: sādhanatvaṃ vrajaty eva śānto dāntādiśāsanāt // SamUpad_I,18.219 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1289: vākyārthaṃ tata ātmānaṃ sarvaṃ paśyati kevalam // SamUpad_I,18.220 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1291: asattve hy anyamānasya vidhis taṃ yojayet katham // SamUpad_I,18.221 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1293: na hi brahmāsmi karteti viruddhe bhavato dhiyau // SamUpad_I,18.222 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1294: brahmāsmīti hi vidyeyaṃ naiva karteti bādhyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1295: sakāmo baddha ity evaṃ pramāṇābhāsajātayā // SamUpad_I,18.223 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1296: śāstrād brahmāsmi nānyo 'ham iti buddhir bhaved dṛḍhā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1297: yadāyuktā tadaivaṃ dhīr yathā dehātmadhīr iti // SamUpad_I,18.224 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1298: sabhayād abhayaṃ prāptas tadarthaṃ yatate ca yaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1299: sa punaḥ sabhayaṃ gantuṃ svatantraś cen na hīcchati // SamUpad_I,18.225 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1302: ataḥ sarvam idaṃ siddhaṃ yat prāg asmābhir īritam // SamUpad_I,18.227 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1303: yo hi yasmād viraktaḥ syān nāsau tasmai pravartate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1304: lokatrayād viraktatvān mumukṣuḥ kim itīhate // SamUpad_I,18.228 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1305: kṣudhayā pīḍyamāno 'pi na viṣaṃ hy attum icchati /
GSP33samkupad_u:1306: miṣṭānnadhvastatṛḍ jānan nāmūḍhas taj jighatsati // SamUpad_I,18.229 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1308: ujjahārālivad yo nas tasmai sadgurave namaḥ // SamUpad_I,18.230 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1312: ahaṃ mameti tvam anartham īhase parārtham icchanti tavānya īhitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1313: na te 'rthabodho na hi me 'sti cārthitā tataś ca yuktaḥ śama eva te manaḥ // SamUpad_I,19.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1314: yato na cānyaḥ paramāt sanātanāt sadaiva tṛpto 'ham ato na me 'rthitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1315: sadaiva muktaś ca na kāmaye hitaṃ yatasva cetaḥ praśamāya te 'dhikam // SamUpad_I,19.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1316: ṣaḍūrmimālābhyativṛtta eva yaḥ sa eva cātmā jagataś ca naḥ śruteḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1317: pramāṇataś cāpi mayā pravedyate mudhaiva tasmāc ca manas tavehitam // SamUpad_I,19.4 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1318: tvayi praśānte na hi sāsti bhedadhīr yato jagan moham upaiti māyayā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1319: graho hi māyāprabhavasya kāraṇaṃ grahād vimoke na hi sāsti kasyacit // SamUpad_I,19.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1320: na me 'sti mohas tava ceṣṭitena hi prabuddhatattvas tv asito hy avikriyaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1321: na pūrvatattvottarabhedatā hi no vṛthaiva tasmāc ca manas tavehitam // SamUpad_I,19.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1322: yataś ca nityo 'ham ato na cānyathā vikārayoge hi bhaved anityatā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1323: sadā prabhāto 'ham ato hi cādvayo vikalpitaṃ cāpy asad ity avasthitam // SamUpad_I,19.7 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1324: abhāvarūpaṃ tvam asīha he mano nirīkṣyamāṇe na hi yuktito 'stitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1325: sato hy anāśād asato 'py ajanmato dvayaṃ ca te 'tas tava nāstiteṣyate // SamUpad_I,19.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1326: draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṃ ca tathā ca darśanaṃ bhramaḥ sa sarvas tava kalpito hi saḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1327: dṛśeś ca bhinnaṃ na hi dṛśyam īkṣyate svapan vibodhe ca tathā na bhidyate // SamUpad_I,19.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1328: vikalpanā cāpi tathādvayā bhaved avastuyogāt tad alātacakravat /
GSP33samkupad_u:1329: na śaktibhedo 'sti yato na cātmanāṃ tato 'dvayatvaṃ śrutito 'vasīyate // SamUpad_I,19.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1330: mithaś ca bhinnā yadi te hi cetanāḥ kṣayas tu teṣāṃ parimāṇayogataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1331: dhruvo bhaved bhedavatāṃ hi dṛṣṭato jagatkṣayaś cāpi samastamokṣataḥ // SamUpad_I,19.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1332: na me 'sti kaścin na ca so 'smi kasyacid yato 'dvayo 'haṃ na hi cāsti kalpitam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1333: akalpitaś cāsmi purā prasiddhito vikalpanāyā dvayam eva kalpitam // SamUpad_I,19.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1334: vikalpanā cāpy abhave na vidyate sad anyad ity evam ato na nāstitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1335: yataḥ pravṛttā tava cāpi kalpanā purā prasiddher na ca tad vikalpitam // SamUpad_I,19.13 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1336: asad dvayaṃ te 'pi hi yad yad īkṣyate na dṛṣṭam ity eva na caiva nāstitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1337: yataḥ pravṛttā sadasadvikalpanā vicāravac cāpi tathādvayaṃ ca sat // SamUpad_I,19.14 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1338: sad abhyupetaṃ bhavatopakalpitaṃ vicārahetor yadi tasya nāstitā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1339: vicārahānāc ca tathaiva saṃsthitaṃ na cet tad iṣṭaṃ nitarāṃ sad iṣyate // SamUpad_I,19.15 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1340: asatsamaṃ caiva sad ity apīti ced anarthavattvāt kharaśṛṅgatulyataḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1341: anarthavattvaṃ tv asati hy akāraṇaṃ na caiva tasmān na viparyaye 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,19.16 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1342: asiddhataś cāpi vicārakāraṇād dvayaṃ ca tasmāt prasṛtaṃ hi māyayā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1343: śruteḥ smṛteś cāpi tathā hi yuktitaḥ prasiddhyatītthaṃ na tu yujyate 'nyathā // SamUpad_I,19.17 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1344: vikalpanāc cāpi vidharmakaṃ śruteḥ purā prasiddheś ca vikalpato 'dvayam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1345: na ceti netīti tathā vikalpitaṃ niṣidhyate 'trāpy avaśeṣasiddhaye // SamUpad_I,19.18 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1346: akalpite 'py evam ajādvayākṣare vikalpayantaḥ sad asac ca janmabhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1347: svacittamāyāprabhavaṃ ca te bhavaṃ jarāṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca niyānti saṃtatam // SamUpad_I,19.19 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1348: bhavābhavatvaṃ tu na ced avasthitir na tasya cānyas tv iti janma nānyathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1349: sato hy asattvād asataś ca sattvato na ca kriyā kārakam ity ato 'py ajam // SamUpad_I,19.20 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1350: akurvad iṣṭaṃ yadi vāsya kārakaṃ na kiṃcid anyan nanu nāsty akārakam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1351: sato 'viśeṣād asataś ca saccyutau tulāntayor yadvad aniścayān na hi // SamUpad_I,19.21 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1352: na cet sa iṣṭaḥ sadasadviparyayaḥ kathaṃ bhavaḥ syāt sadasadvyavasthitau /
GSP33samkupad_u:1353: vibhaktam etad dvayam apy avasthitaṃ na janma tasmāc ca mano hi kasyacit // SamUpad_I,19.22 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1354: athābhyupetyāpi bhavaṃ tavecchato bravīmi nārthas tava ceṣṭitena me /
GSP33samkupad_u:1355: na hānavṛddhī na yataḥ svato 'sato bhavo 'nyato vā yadi vāstitā tayoḥ // SamUpad_I,19.23 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1356: dhruvā hy anityāś ca na cānyayogino mithaś ca kāryaṃ na ca teṣu yujyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1357: ato na kasyāpi hi kiṃcid iṣyate svayaṃ hi tattvaṃ na niruktigocaram // SamUpad_I,19.24 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1358: samaṃ tu tasmāt satataṃ vibhātavad dvayād vimuktaṃ sadasadvikalpitāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:1359: nirīkṣya yuktyā śrutitaś ca buddhimān aśeṣanirvāṇam upaiti dīpavat // SamUpad_I,19.25 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1360: avedyam ekaṃ yad ananyavedināṃ kutārkikāṇāṃ ca suvedyam anyathā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1361: nirīkṣya cetthaṃ tv aguṇagraho 'guṇaṃ na yāti mohaṃ grahadoṣamuktitaḥ // SamUpad_I,19.26 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1362: ato 'nyathā na grahanāśa iṣyate vimohabuddher graha eva kāraṇam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1363: graho 'py ahetur hy analas tv anindhano yathā praśāntiṃ paramāṃ tathā vrajet // SamUpad_I,19.27 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1364: vimathya vedodadhitaḥ samuddhṛtaṃ surair mahābdhes tu yathā mahātmabhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1365: tathāmṛtaṃ jñānam idaṃ hi yaiḥ purā namo gurubhyaḥ param īkṣitaṃ ca yaiḥ // SamUpad_I,19.28 //
