GSP33samkupad_u:1368: atha mokṣasādhanopadeśavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmo mumukṣūṇāṃ śraddadhānānām arthinām arthāya // SamUpad_II,1.1 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1369_0: tad idaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ sādhanasādhyād anityāt sarvasmād viraktāya tyaktaputravittalokaiṣaṇāya
GSP33samkupad_u:1369_2: śucaye brāhmaṇāya vidhivad upasannāya śiṣyāya jātikarmavṛttavidyābhijanaiḥ parīkṣitāya
GSP33samkupad_u:1369_3: brūyat punaḥ punar yāvad grahaṇaṃ dṛḍhībhavati // SamUpad_II,1.2 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1371: dṛḍhagṛhītā hi vidyātmanaḥ śreyase santatyai ca bhavati /
GSP33samkupad_u:1372: vidyāsantatiś ca prāṇyanugrahāya bhavati naur iva nadīṃ titīrṣoḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1373: śāstraṃ ca -- “yady apy asmā imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād etad eva tato bhūyaḥ” iti /
GSP33samkupad_u:1376: “ācāryaḥ plāvayitā tasya [samyag]jñānaṃ plava ihocyate” ityādiśrutibhyaḥ smṛtibhyaś ca // SamUpad_II,1.3 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1377_0: śiṣyasya jñānāgrahaṇaṃ ca liṅgair buddhvā tadagrahaṇahetūn adharmalaukikapramādanityānitya[vastu]vivekaviṣayāsaṃjātadṛḍhapūrvaśrutatvalokacintāvekṣaṇajātyādyabhimānādīṃs
GSP33samkupad_u:1377_1: tatpratipakṣaiḥ śrutismṛtivihitair apanayed akrodhādibhir ahiṃsādibhiś ca yamair
GSP33samkupad_u:1378: amānitvādiguṇaṃ ca jñānopāyaṃ samyag grāhayet // SamUpad_II,1.5 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1379_2: kevalaparānugrahaprayojano vidyopayogārthī pūrvam upadiśet -- “sad eva somyedam agra
GSP33samkupad_u:1384: “sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma” ity[ādyāḥ] ātmaikatvapratipādanaparāḥ śrutiḥ // SamUpad_II,1.6 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1385: upadiśya ca grāhayed brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam -- “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā“,
GSP33samkupad_u:1409: “uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ” ityādibhiḥ śrutyuktalakṣaṇāviruddhābhiḥ paramātmāsaṃsāritvapratipādanaparābhis tasya sarveṇānanyatvapratipādanaparābhiś ca // SamUpad_II,1.8 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1410: evaṃ śrutismṛtibhir gṛhītaparamātmalakṣaṇaṃ śiṣyaṃ saṃsārasāgarād uttitīrṣuṃ pṛcchet -- kas tvam asi somyeti // SamUpad_II,1.9 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1411: sa yadi brūyāt -- brāhmaṇaputro 'donvayo brahmacāry āsaṃ gṛhastho vedānīm asmi paramahaṃsaparivrāṭ saṃsārasāgarāj janmamṛtyumahāgrāhād uttitīrṣur iti // SamUpad_II,1.10 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1412: ācāryo brūyad -- ihaiva te somya mṛtasya śarīraṃ vayobhir adyate mṛdbhāvaṃ vāpadyate,
GSP33samkupad_u:1414: nahi nadyā avare kūle bhasmībhūto nadyāḥ pāraṃ tariṣyasīti // SamUpad_II,1.11 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1420: tasminn ahaṃ svakṛtadharmādharmavaśāt pakṣī nīḍam iva praviṣṭaḥ punaḥ punaḥ śarīravināśe dharmādharmavaśāc charīrāntaraṃ yāsyāmi,
GSP33samkupad_u:1422: evam evāham anādau saṃsāre devatiryaṅmanuṣyanirayasthāneṣu svakarmavaśād upāttam upāttaṃ śarīraṃ tyajan,
GSP33samkupad_u:1424_0: janmamaraṇaprabandhacakre ghaṭīyantravat svakarmaṇā bhrāmyamāṇaḥ krameṇedaṃ śarīram
GSP33samkupad_u:1424_1: āsādya saṃsāracakrabhramaṇād asmān nirviṇṇo bhagavantam upasanno 'smi saṃsāracakrabhramaṇapraśamāyeti /
GSP33samkupad_u:1426: śarīrāṇy āgacchanty apagacchanti ca vāsāṃṣīva puruṣasyeti // SamUpad_II,1.12 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1427: ācāryo brūyat -- sādhv avādiḥ samyak paśyasi /
GSP33samkupad_u:1433_0: taṃ prati brūyād ācāryaḥ -- yatas tvaṃ bhinnajātyanvayasaṃskāraṃ śarīraṃ jātyanvayasaṃskāravarjitasyātmanaḥ

GSP33samkupad_u:1772: nanu citimattve same 'pi bhṛtyasvāminor anyonyārthatvaṃ dṛṣṭam // SamUpad_II,2.72 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1773: naivam, agner uṣṇaprakāśavat tava citimattvasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:1775: tatraivaṃ sati svabuddhyārūḍham eva sarvam upalabhase 'gnyuṣṇaprakāśatulyena kūṭasthanityacaitanyasvarūpeṇa /
GSP33samkupad_u:1776: yadi caivam ātmanaḥ sarvadā nirviśeṣatvam abhyupagacchasi /
GSP33samkupad_u:1778: suṣupte viśramya viśramya jāgratsvapnayor duḥkham anubhavāmi /
GSP33samkupad_u:1792: tathā pratyayānām apy ahaṃpratyayālambanavastubhedānāṃ saṃhatatvād acaitanyopapatteḥ svārthatvāsaṃbhavāt svarūpavyatiriktagrāhakagrāhyatvena siddhiḥ śabdādivad eva /
GSP33samkupad_u:1793: asaṃhatatve sati caitanyātmakatvāt svārtho 'py ahaṃ pratyayānāṃ nīlapītādyākārāṇām upalabdheti vikriyāvān eva,
GSP33samkupad_u:1795: taṃ gurur uvāca -- na yuktas tava saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1796: yatas teṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ niyamenāśeṣata upalabdher evāpariṇāmitvāt kūṭasthatvasiddhau niścayahetum evāśeṣacittapracāropalabdhiṃ saṃśayahetum āttha /
GSP33samkupad_u:1805: yo hi bauddhaḥ pratyayaḥ sa dhātvartho vikriyātmaka ātmana upalabdhyābhāsaphalāvasāna ity upalabdhiśabdenopacaryate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1808: ity uktaḥ śiṣya āha -- nanu bhagavan,
GSP33samkupad_u:1812: tathopalabdhiśabdopacarito 'pi dhātvartho bauddhapratyaya ātmana upalabdhivikriyāvasānaś cen nātmanaḥ kūṭasthatāṃ pratipādayituṃ samarthaḥ // SamUpad_II,2.78 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1816: na tu tārkikasamaya ivānyopalabdhir anya ca upalabdhā ca // SamUpad_II,2.79 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1821: na tv ātmano vikriyotpādanāvasāna iti mayoktam // SamUpad_II,2.81 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1822: śiṣya āha -- kathaṃ tarhi kūṭasthe mayy aśeṣasvaviṣayacittapracāropalabdhṛtvam ity āttha // SamUpad_II,2.82 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1829: kiṃ tv avidyāmātras tu aparādha iti prāg evāvocam // SamUpad_II,2.85 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1833: taṃ gurur uvāca -- kiṃ tv anubhūyete tvayā sa[n]tatam // SamUpad_II,2.87 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1835: kiṃ tu vicchidya vicchidya na tu santatam // SamUpad_II,2.88 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1836: [taṃ] gurur uvāca -- āgantuke tv ete na tavātmabhūte /
GSP33samkupad_u:1837: yadi tavātmabhūte caitanyasvarūpavat svataḥsiddhe santate eva syātām /
GSP33samkupad_u:1841: na hi yasya yat svarūpaṃ tat tadvyabhicāri dṛṣṭam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1844: tan naṣṭaṃ nāstīti vā bādhyam eva syāt,
GSP33samkupad_u:1854: naitad varśaśatenāpy upapattyā kalpayituṃ śaknumo vayam,
GSP33samkupad_u:1856: [tasya] saṃhatatvāt pārārthyam anekatvaṃ nāśitvaṃ ca na kenacid upapattyā vārayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1858: caitanyasvarūpasya tv ātmanaḥ svataḥsiddher anyānapekṣatvaṃ na kenacid vārayituṃ śakyam,
GSP33samkupad_u:1860: nanu vyabhicāro darśito mayā suṣupte na paśyāmīti // SamUpad_II,2.92 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1863: paśyatas tava na paśyāmīti vyāhataṃ vacanam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1865: suṣupte mayā caitanyam anyad vā kiṃcid dṛṣṭam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1867: yasmād dṛṣṭam eva pratiṣedhasi, na dṛṣṭim /
GSP33samkupad_u:1868: yā tava dṛṣṭis tac caitanyam iti mayoktam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1869: yayā tvaṃ vidyamānayā na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam iti pratiṣedhasi,
GSP33samkupad_u:1871: tarhi sarvatrāvyabhicārāt kūṭasthanityatvaṃ siddhaṃ svata eva,
GSP33samkupad_u:1873: svataḥsiddhasya hi pramātur anyasya prameyasya paricchittiṃ prati pramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33samkupad_u:1874: yā tv anyā nityā paricchittir apekṣyate 'nyasyāparicchittirūpasya paricchedāya,
GSP33samkupad_u:1876: ātmani pramāṇatve pramātṛtve vā na tāṃ prati pramāṇāpekṣā,
GSP33samkupad_u:1878: yathā prakāśanam uṣṇatvaṃ vā lohodakādiṣu parato 'pekṣyate 'gnyādityādibhyaḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:1882: anityatva eva pramā syān na nityatva iti cet // SamUpad_II,2.94 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1884: na hy avagateḥ pramātve 'nityāvagatiḥ pramā na nityeti viśeṣo 'vagamyate // SamUpad_II,2.95 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1886: anityāyāṃ tu yatnāntaritatvād avagatir apekṣyata iti viśeṣaṃ syād iti cet // SamUpad_II,2.96 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1892: avagater evātmani sadbhāvād iti parihṛtam etat // SamUpad_II,2.98 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1903: loke hi prameyaṃ nāma pramātur icchāsmṛtiprayatnapramāṇajanmavyavahitaṃ siddhyati,
GSP33samkupad_u:1905: na ca pramātuḥ pramātā svasya svayam eva kenacid vyavahitaḥ kalpayituṃ śakya icchādīnām anyatamenāpi /
GSP33samkupad_u:1910: smartricchāvadviṣayatve 'pi hy ubhayor anavasthā pūrvavad aparihāryā syāt // SamUpad_II,2.99 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1911: nanu pramātṛviṣayāvagatyanutpattāv anavagata eva pramātā syād iti cet // SamUpad_II,2.100 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1916: avagateś caitanyātmajyotiṣaḥ svātmany anityatva ātmanaḥ svārthatānupapattiḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:1920: tataś ca tasya caitanyajyotiṣaḥ prāg utpatteḥ pradhvaṃsāc cordhvam ātmany evābhāvāt,
GSP33samkupad_u:1923: yadā ca tad utpannam ātmani vidyate,
GSP33samkupad_u:1926: tasmād ātmano 'nyanirapekṣam eva nityacaitanyajyotiṣṭvaṃ siddham // SamUpad_II,2.101 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1928: asati pramātṛtve kathaṃ pramātuḥ pramātṛtvam // SamUpad_II,2.102 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1933: yathā dhātvarthasya tiṣṭhatyādeḥ phalasya gatyādipūrvakasyānityasyāpūrvasya nityasya vā,
GSP33samkupad_u:1934: rūpaviśeṣo nāstīti tulyo vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ -- tiṣṭhanti manuṣyāḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:1936: tathā nityāvagatisvarūpe 'pi pramātari pramātṛtvavyapadeśo na virudhyate,
GSP33samkupad_u:1942: takṣādīnāṃ tu kāryakaraṇair nityam eva saṃhatatvam iti vāsyādyupādāne nānavasthā syād iti // SamUpad_II,2.104 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1943: iha tv asaṃhatasvabhāvasya karaṇānupādāne kartṛtvaṃ nopapadyata iti karaṇam upādeyam,
GSP33samkupad_u:1944: tadupādānam api vikriyaiveti tatkartṛtve karaṇāntaram upādeyam,
GSP33samkupad_u:1945: tadupādāne 'py anyad iti pramātuḥ svātantrye 'navasthāparihāryā syāt /
GSP33samkupad_u:1948: athānyad ātmānam upetya kriyāṃ kārayatīti cet / na /
GSP33samkupad_u:1951: na hy ātmano 'nyad acetanaṃ vastu svapramāṇakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33samkupad_u:1954: so 'py ātmaivāsaṃhataḥ svārthaḥ syān na parārthaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1955: na ca dehendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ svārthatām avagantuṃ śaknumo 'vagatyavasānapratyayāpekṣasiddhidarśanāt // SamUpad_II,2.105 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1956: nanu dehasyāvagatau na kaścit pratyakṣādipratyayāntaram apekṣate // SamUpad_II,2.106 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1960: bāhyā eva hi śabdādayo dehendriyākārapariṇatā iti pratyakṣādipramāṇāpekṣayaiva [hi] siddhiḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:1961: siddhir iti ca pramāṇaphalam avagatim avocāma,
GSP33samkupad_u:1962: sā cāvagatiḥ kūṭasthā svayaṃsiddhātmajyotiḥsvarūpeti ca // SamUpad_II,2.107 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1963: atrāha codakaḥ -- avagatiḥ pramāṇānāṃ phalaṃ kūṭasthanityātmajyotiḥsvarūpeti ca vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33samkupad_u:1969: tena pramāṇānāṃ phalam ity upacaryate // SamUpad_II,2.108 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1974: yena ca sukhaduḥkhamohapratyayāvagatirūpeṇa pārārthyaṃ tenaiva svarūpeṇānātmano 'stitvaṃ nānyena rūpāntareṇa,
GSP33samkupad_u:1976: yathā hi loke rajjusarpamarīcyudakādīnāṃ tadavagativyatirekeṇābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:1982: yathā svapne nīlapītādyākārabhedarūpāḥ pratyayās tadavagatiṃ vyabhicarantaḥ paramārthato na santīty ucyante,
GSP33samkupad_u:1983: evaṃ jāgraty api nīlapītādipratyayabhedās tām evāvagatiṃ vyabhicaranto 'satyarūpā bhavitum arhanti /
GSP33samkupad_u:1984: tasyāś cāvagater anyo 'vagantā nāstīti na svena svarūpeṇa svayam upādātuṃ hātuṃ vā śakyate,
GSP33samkupad_u:1994: mumukṣūṇām upāttapuṇyāpuṇyakṣapaṇaparāṇām apūrvānupacayārthināṃ parisaṃkhyānam idam ucyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:1996: pravṛtteś ceṣṭāniṣṭamiśraphalāni karmāṇy upacīyanta iti tanmokṣārtham // SamUpad_II,3.112 //
GSP33samkupad_u:1997: tatra śabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ śrotrādigrāhyatvāt svātmani pareṣu vā vijñānābhāvaḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:2000: yena ca jñāyante sa jñātṛtvād atajjātīyaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:2004: tatra śabdādibhir upalabhyamānaiḥ pīḍyamāno vidvān evaṃ parisaṃcakṣīta // SamUpad_II,3.114 //
GSP33samkupad_u:2005: śabdas tu dhvanisāmānyamātreṇa viśeṣadharmair vā ṣaḍjādibhiḥ priyaiḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:2008: māṃ dṛksvabhāvam asaṃsargiṇam avikriyam acalam anidhanam abhayam atyantasūkṣmam aviṣayaṃ gocarīkṛtya spraṣṭuṃ naivārhaty asaṃsargitvād eva mama /
GSP33samkupad_u:2009: ata eva na śabdanimittā hānir vṛddhir vā /
GSP33samkupad_u:2010: ato māṃ kiṃ kariṣyati stutinindādipriyāpriyatvādilakṣaṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP33samkupad_u:2011: avivekinaṃ hi śabdam ātmatvena gataṃ priyaḥ śabdo vardhayed apriyaś ca kṣapayet,
GSP33samkupad_u:2012: avivekitvān na tu mama vivekino vālāgramātram api kartum utsahata iti /
GSP33samkupad_u:2013: evam eva sparśasāmānyena tadviśeṣaiś ca śītoṣṇamṛdukarkaśādijvarodaraśūlādilakṣaṇaiś cāpriyaiḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:2014: priyaiś ca kaiścic charīrasamavāyibhir bāhyāgantukanimittaiś ca,
GSP33samkupad_u:2015: na mama kācid vikriyā vṛddhihānilakṣaṇā asparśatvāt kriyate,
GSP33samkupad_u:2017: tathā rūpasāmānyena tadviśeṣaiś ca priyāpriyaiḥ strīvyañjanādilakṣaṇaiḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:2018: arūpatvān na mama kācid dhānir vṛddhir vā kriyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:2019: tathā rasasāmānyena tadviśeṣaiś ca [priyāpriyaiḥ] madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyair mūḍhabuddhibhiḥ parigṛhītaiḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:2020: arasātmakasya na mama kācid dhānir vṛddhir vā kriyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:2022: agandhātmakasya na mama kācid dhānir vṛddhir vā kriyate /
GSP33samkupad_u:2023: “aśabdam asparśam arūpam avyayaṃ tathārasaṃ nityam agandhavac ca yat” iti śruteḥ // SamUpad_II,3.115 //
GSP33samkupad_u:2024: kiṃ ca ya eva bāhyaḥ śabdādayas te śarīrākāreṇa saṃsthitāḥ,
GSP33samkupad_u:2027: tatraivaṃ sati viduṣo mama na kaścic chatrur mitram udāsīno vāsti /
GSP33samkupad_u:2028: tatra yadi [kaścin]mithyājñānābhimānena priyam apriyaṃ vā prayuyuṅkṣeta kriyāphalalakṣaṇam,
GSP33samkupad_u:2034: yāpi śarīrendriyasaṃsthānamātram upalakṣya madbhaktānāṃ viparītānāṃ ca priyāpriyādiprayuyuṅkṣā,
